Can you beat the challenges to find out why the undead are here and how to get rid of them? Prepare your hands, feet, and mind - Undead Quest is waiting for you.

name: Unicorn Fun
summary: Unicorn Fun is a retro rhythm game that lets the user complete a level with the controller buttons. Try to complete the level with your best time. Trophies are collected as you complete the rhythm goals. Single player fun and arcade style entertainment.

name: Under Observation
summary: You are a researcher working at a Bioweapons R&D company, focusing on national security. The weapons being developed here are usually horrifying beasts that possess many different perks. In your case, one of them has escaped and it's up to you to continue your research or escape the facility.

name: Unstable Portal
summary: "Unstable Teleport" is a 2D platformer shooter where the player, jumping on platforms, shoots back from waves of enemies, exploding barrels and collecting bullets in order to reach the end and close the portals.

name: Unloved
summary: You wake up in your house. And you're all alone. The only thing that is with you, is your sanity. Or is it?

name: Unheard: The Lethal Script
summary:
Unheard: The Lethal Script is a dlc for Unheard which takes place in The Peak Hotel.
Join the investigators as they enter The Peak Hotel and see how this deadly scenario plays out!

name: Uno 2 Go
summary: All aboard the newest way to play UNO! The card game everyone loves is going on a cruise and this is your lucky invitation! UNO 2 is the easiest way to play UNO anywhere and at any time.

name: Undertone
summary: A stylized first-person game that makes use of a lens gun to mix colors to effectively fight monsters.

name: Unable
summary: Unable is a Chinese Yume Nikki fangame. It stars Bility, a girl whose right eye is bandaged up. The objective of the game is to collect effects and explore the dream world.

name: Unduhagge
summary: Unduhagge is a dream exploration game in the spirit of Yume Nikki. Join Mina Mori as she navigates a dreamscape full of absurdities, distressing personal memories and other experiences that push her beyond the veil and into the unknown.

name: Ungus
summary: Ungus is a Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Pine, who wakes up in a strange forest, and explore the surrounding world. A submission for the 4th Yume Nikki Fangame jam.

name: University Tycoon
summary:
University is awaiting you!

Start out your student career in the time-honoured England, meet friends and visit foreign countries as an exchange student in order to achieve your task to pass the famous master degree with "suma cum laude".

Choose between five characters, e.g. the nerd Jason, the pretty Lindsey or the ace Bobby and try to survive the hard student life.

name: Uncharted Ocean 2
summary: Time to set sail! This is destined to be a journey full of opportunities. Open new trade routes, accumulate fortunes, and establish a maritime empire of your own! It is also a dangerous journey, you must defeat the evil pirates and other mystical dangers the ocean offers to a captain.

name: Undertale Together
summary: A co-op mod of Undertale, with this mod you will be able to play the entire game with two players.

name: Ungrateful Birds: No Good Deed
summary: An often frantic, slapstick platformer for up to two players. Over three dozen stages of freeing birds from cages with rocks, only for the ungrateful birds to pick up the rocks and try to hurt you with them.

name: Ungrateful Birds: Call of the Desert
summary: A standalone companion game/expansion to Ungrateful Birds: No Good Deed, with 16 new stages and new birds. For one or two players.

name: Unrestrained
summary: Unrestrained is a great 3D horror game in which you have to survive in a mental hospital, playing as a reporter named Carl.

name: Undertale: Kindred Spirits
summary:
Undertale: Kindred Spirits is an Undertale fangame that tells the story of Batty and Mel, who possess the purple and blue souls respectively!

Hiding from the Underground's Royal Guard, their journey takes many twists and turns, ultimately challenging their partnership along with whether the food is actually good - down here in the underground.

name: UnrealGundy
summary: Welcome to UnrealGundy, a 3D platformer made by drevil1200. You play as "Gundy", a fictional character whose mission is to locate a gun, and fight any enemies along the way until you get to the boss. Be prepared for a fight at the end where only the most talented gamers will win!

name: Unusual Ghost
summary: When there is no one in the house, a ghost wakes up. He is looking for all the candles in the house to leave the owners without light. After all, when he scares them, they light candles and he has to hide again. Collect them all.

name: Undertale 2: Overtale
summary: Step into the shoes of John Undertale as he attempts to rewrite history to save the ones he loves from an avian catastrophe.

name: Unbelievaboom!
summary: This title is an explosive soccer shooter based on the concept that explosions are fun. Use bombs and exploding bullets to blow up your surroundings and aim for the goal! In this title, you can blow up not only enemies and balls, but also yourself, goal posts, and everything else!

name: Undead Carnage League
summary:
A virus broke out of the inner cities, zombies spread across the planet, and now… life’s pretty boring. What do you do for fun in a post-apocalyptic world? Jump in your car and join the Undead Carnage League.
Join the elite zombie smashers, hit the road and run down as many of the drooling mindless horde as you can, grabbing their gold teeth and avoiding obstacles and zombie rockets. The more gold teeth you collect, the more choices you have to upgrade to some sweet new wheels. Compete against other dangerous drivers and throw them off course with your own explosive ammo to top the global leaderboard for the highest honour - the Undead Carnage League trophy.

name: Under the Brine
summary:
There’s something off in this town, and the forest is one of them.
Your whole life flips upside down the day you stumble across a dead body at the beach that nobody seems to recognize.
It’s up to you to find out what really happened and save him before it's too late.

name: Under
summary: You woke up in the middle of WW2 and realized that all of your comrades are gone. You now have to explore the place to find out the truth about what really happened and where do all your comrades go.

name: Unfair
summary: You're a young lawyer, offered a last-minute murder case to defend you can't reject... or win...

name: Unsung Heroes
summary: Sir Gaelin, the Commander of the Knights of the Stormlands finds himself in an uphill battle against the Sovereign King and his Lords. This is the beginning of his tale...

name: Under the Map
summary: A Horror Survival Game where you enter a backroom-style area trying to fight off entities and escape the many many levels. Will you dare to play?

name: Underworld Football Manager
summary:
Underworld Football Manager 2019-2020 mixes traditional soccer club tactics and strategy with bribery and sabotage in a unique twist on soccer management.
Build a soccer empire and pit your top eleven players against millions of managers across the globe. Part football manager, part city builder, part strategy, you’ll need to sign young pro players and turn them into superstars, while building up your city and facilities to gain every inch of advantage you can.
But simply setting up your squad isn’t enough! You’ll need to use all your cunning to bribe and attack your opponents’ players, and vandalize their facilities to gain an edge over the competition!

name: Under the Sea: Swim
summary:
This gams is big fun with tough , speed, exciting!
you have to escape from big fish!

name: Unblock the Brick: Casual Block Puzzle
summary: A classic puzzle game in which you have to move blocks and make way for the main block!

name: UnderDungeon + Clumsy Rush
summary: Become the deadliest delivery... cat in the world. Intense fights, multiple weapons and demanding boss fights. Join Kimuto on his hardest first day on the job. Clumsy Rush is a guaranteed dose of a laugh for friends and family.

name: Unblock the River
summary: Unblock the River is a simple and addictive puzzle game. Move the block and let the river flow.

name: Unravel Lines Puzzle
summary: Unravel all lines by moving the balls across the board! Level is completed, when no lines are intersected. Every level has one more ball or one more connection, which makes the game progressively harder. Use your imagination and concentration and unravel every single line!

name: Unreal Flash 3
summary: Unreal Flash 3 is an arena shooter inspired by the popular game Unreal Tournament. Run, jump, collect weapons, kill your enemies and survive as long as you can. Play the story mode of Unreal Flash 3 or choose between the 4 free modes Deathmatch, Capture the Flag, Instagib and King of the Hill.

name: Unreal Flash 2007
summary: Unreal Flash 2007 throws you into an adrenaline junkie's paradise combining pick-up and play simplicity with fast-paced action in this 2D platform shooter with AI opponents.

name: Under the Sky World: Another
summary: "Under the Sky World' is another story of if. If Karin in the main plot infected with a virus, so on the wrong path of words ......This is a small story about Karin's "if".

name: UnderBackrooms
summary: UnderBackrooms is a cooperative horror game set in a mysterious parallel universe of empty rooms and endless corridors. With moments of tension and surprise, players must be on guard to survive. Explore the backrooms and uncover their secrets to escape this nightmare world.

name: Unnatural: Benighted
summary: Two demon hunters investigate the disappearance of people and encounter unexplained phenomena.

name: Unreal Flash
summary: Unreal Flash. The most explosive gaming experience ever. Can you become master of the arena? Dozens of weapons, bosses characters and arenas.

name: Unlimited Fight Ultimate Strike
summary: In the best 3D style, a continuation of the first game in the Unlimited Fight series, with improvements in combat mechanics, visuals, stories and much more, immerse yourself in this world full of action, epic and intense battles alone or with friends

name: Unknown Pyramid
summary: A roguelike horror game set in a randomly generated labyrinth. Escape from the complex labyrinth of pyramids while running from unknown entity that lurks in the labyrinth!

name: Unity of Command II: Desert Fox
summary: Your command: the Afrika Korps. Its leader: Gen. Erwin Rommel.

name: Unsolved Case: Fatal Clue - Collector's Edition
summary: Solve a series of tough cases, full of personal drama! In the new game series, you have to unravel some of the hardest mysteries using both logic and your intuition!

name: Unwound
summary: Lose yourself in a surreal candyland adventure about transformation and escapism. Descend into a land of weirdos and forgotten memories as you assemble a new you from whatever you find.

name: University Love Affair
summary: University life is always interesting. It is full of romance, dreams and plans for the future. Derek Winters is a university student. Difficulties appeared on his way, having passed which he will be able to find harmony, love and everything he wants. His fate is in your hands. YOU can help him or...

name: United Assault: World War 2
summary: Fight on land, sea and air in an open world rogue lite FPS set in authentic theatres of of World War 2.

name: Underpowered
summary: This roguelite is set in a mysterious underground world, where building machines is the only way to survive! Build contraptions, automate, sell your goods and fight monsters!

name: Unexpected Futa Corruption
summary: Unexpected Futa Corruption is a game about how a beautiful and pure angel girl finds herself in bed with her unexpected futanari date. She turns into a horny slutty futa-slut as they explore their fantasies together and with other futa girls from the neighborhood.

name: Universe Survivors
summary: A space ship game that you destroy asteroids make money gain xp and level up. Earn upgrades to improve your ship. And destroy the multiple bosses including a centipede monster and the spike ship. Arcade style vibe with unique mechanics.

name: Unrushed Defence
summary: Unrushed Defense - 2D tower defense strategy. Manage your castle, build defensive towers, upgrade them or sell them, fight off waves of enemies at the first opportunity and conquer all the lands! Prove to all the evil spirits of this forest the indestructibility and purity of your noble goal!

name: Undertunnel
summary: Leaving the dystopian metropolis behind, a strange & dangerous journey lies ahead. You must venture into the depths of the sprawling Neo-industrial tunnels below. Weirdos, Gangs, Mutants, Machines, Traps, Humour & More awaits, as you make your way through... Undertunnel.

name: Unsolved Case: Fatal Clue
summary: Use your logic and intuition to uncover chilling secrets in the additional locations! Find helpful clues and solve complicated puzzles in a series of interactive crime stories!

name: Unreal Anthology
summary: Released on the 8th anniversary of the initial game of the Unreal series, this collection contained every title and expansion available for the PC to-date with the notable exception of Unreal Tournament 2003. Also included in the bundle was a soundtrack CD featuring a selection of 23 tracks from the bundled games.

name: Universal Studios Theme Parks Adventure Adventure
summary:
Christmas, 2001. You just unwrapped a brand new Nintendo Gamecube, the latest and greatest in video game hardware. All your friends will be so jealous.

Unfortunately, your parents did their holiday shopping late and Kohl's didn't have much left in terms of software selection. So you unwrap your one and only game, Universal Studios Theme Parks Adventure, and read the back cover:

It's a VIP ticket to theme park adventure!

Lights... Camera... Play! You've not just a visitor, you're the star in Kemco's Universal Studios Theme Park Adventure, a magical 3-D journey beyond the theme park rides and into an amazing realm of games based upon the most successful movies produced in Hollywood.

You'll love this virtual gaming lark through the world's best movie theme park!
It'll be months before your parents buy you another game. Let's hope this one is good.

name: Unholy Angel
summary: Charming girls that want to test your brain Relax, clear your mind and enjoy

name: UnderDungeon + Cyber Protocol
summary: Become the deadliest delivery... cat in the world. Intense fights, multiple weapons and demanding boss fights. Join Kimuto on his hardest first day on the job. You can also try your puzzle solving skills in Cyber Protocol. An arcade puzzle game set in a Cyberpunk world. Why pick when you can have them both.

name: Unheard: Voices of Crime Edition
summary: Put on your headphones and step back into the past. Use the voices you hear to return to crime scenes, tracking down each individual involved and solving the cases. But where do the voices come from? Can you trust what you hear? And what's the mysterious thread weaving all of these cases together?

name: U.N. Squadron
summary: Side-scrolling shoot-em-up, in a similar style to such games as Gradius, R-Type and Scramble. The aim is to wipe out the enemy, which has gathered around the allied airspace of 'Area 88', in a series of military aircraft-based scenarios. You choose one of three unique pilots; Shin Kazama, Micky Schymon or Greg Gates, each with varying abilities at damage repair, weapon handling and flying skill, and engage the enemy over a series of challenging missions. The player starts out with the weakest plane, the F8E Crusader, which can only be armed with a very basic range weapons. But, through completing various missions, enough cash can be raised to purchase higher-quality aircraft. These superior planes are more agile, have improved resilience to damage and have a greater range of fire. Furthermore, the more advanced fighters can be armed with superior special weapons, such as napalm. The missions include attacks on sand bases, the nuclear submarine 'Seavet' and enemy supply camps, as well as seeing off groups of airborne 'bandits' who swarm-in on Area 88. The enemy is plentiful, and the pace is frantic. Shoot at everything on the screen that moves, and the allied forces might just come out on top......

name: UnMetal: Collector's Edition
summary:
The Collector’s Edition includes:
- Standard Edition (Switch or PS4)
- User Manual
- Physical OST
- Dog-Tag Necklace (2 pieces)
- UnMetal Thermo-adhesive Patch Badge
- Artbook
- Postcard
- Collector's Box.

name: Untold Love Stories
summary: Untold Love Stories is a collection of visual novels in different genres and styles. Romance, meetings, dangers, adventures and even mystery are waiting for you!

name: Uncle Kenny: The Game
summary: Run, jump and shoot! Uncle Kenny has been lured into an abandoned park trail by a mysterious old friend. Fight to survive! 2D platformer with shoot 'em up action and an arcadey feel. A passion project by the developer, ACT 1 is available today!

name: Undead Arena VR
summary:
The apocalypse has been, and gone.

Things are back to normal.

Survivors band together, we all live in fortified cities, and zombies are everywhere.

name: Untitled Hook Game
summary: Untitled Hook Game is a 3D, movement based speedrun platformer in which the player utilises a grappling hook to soar through the platforms to perfect your runs and compete against hundreds of players on the in-game leaderboard!

name: Undead Zone
summary: Survive through as many nights as possible with a card system that you place on the field. You can place defenses and buildings such as farms to feed the last citizens who are fighting for the collective defense.

name: Uniform Girl
summary: This is a search for beautiful girls. Through the wiping of the gentlemen, the girls and girls interact to trigger the unlocking of all CG.

name: Uno Online
summary:
Uno Card Game the fun, classic card game that is the favourite of all the card games. Its really easy to pick up and play and difficult to put down. Its simple to play but still has a strategic component to it

The objective of Uno Card Game is to empty all your cards before the other players get rid of theirs. The player reduces cards by discarding cards that match the top card in the Discard pile.

name: Unsolved Case: Murderous Script - Collector's Edition
summary: The life of a detective is unpredictable and very dangerous. You never know what awaits you around the next corner and what secrets you need to unravel. But you knew what you were getting into, there's no turning back!

name: Unprompted
summary: A.I. is here. Type to guess the words used to create A.I. artworks, while slowly uncovering A.I.'s reflections on its own work. Come investigate more than 1,500 artworks made by A.I. across 7 carefully curated galleries.

name: Unforgiven: Carry The Pain
summary: Broken... Shattered... On a journey to redemption... Carrying the pain of his past errors... Seeking forgiveness by accepting a quest bestowed upon him by the King to cleanse the Underworld from an ancient evil... also giving him a chance for revenge from the one causing the pain in the first place...

name: Unsolved Case: Murderous Script - DLC
summary: Detectives often have to dig through other people's dirty business, but it makes their job more fun. Explore additional locations with various secrets and achieve new goals!

name: Unholy Angel 2
summary: Charming girls that want to test your brain Relax, clear your mind and enjoy

name: Until Daybreak
summary: Léon and his twin sister Anna have always been together, but five years after the deaths of their parents, a deadly illness contracted by Anna threatens to separate them. Determined to fight this fate, Léon is prepared to do anything to stop the same Angel of Death that claimed his parents from taking his sister away from him.

name: Universe 42
summary:
Welcome to never-ending world of the Universe 42.
Universe 42 is a 2D endless runner game.
Your mission is to collect resources to discover new planet that fits for life.
Universe 42 presents you with a infinite world to explore, filled with unique planets and lifeforms, and constant danger and action: asteroids, electric fields, dangerous obstacles.

name: Unicycle Legend
summary: Show the world your legendariousness by conquering all 120 unique, obstacle-filled levels.

name: Unrelaxing Quacks
summary: Don't just sit back and watch these adorable rubber ducks float peacefully in a pool - instead, brace yourself for the unpredictable and wild world of quack destruction!

name: Unwashed
summary: Trapped in a never-ending nightmare, time and reality become distorted. Unwashed is a bone-chilling psychological horror game. As you seek shelter from the raging storm, you arrive at the homestay house, discovering that there's a sinister connection to the government's secret project.

name: United 1944
summary: Explore a world in ruins, scavenge resources, craft weaponry & equipment and fight for every inch of terrain. Set up and defend your outposts & blow up your enemies' bases. Unlock crafting recipes, skills, and skins. Let the best team tactics win!

name: Undead Village
summary: Hack, Slash, and shoot your way to clearing the Town of BlackWalk of the Undead that curse it. Upgrade stats buy and sell Items and even blow stuff up in this wave based 3rd person action game with light Rpg mechanics.

name: Unsung Empires: The Cholas
summary: Unsung Empire: The Cholas is an action-adventure game played from a third-person perspective, with platforming elements. Players traverse several environments, moving through locations including towns, buildings, and wilderness to advance through the game's story.

name: Unyielder
summary: Unyielder is an intense Boss-Rush Movement-Shooter with a flexible and exploitable Roguelite-Looter sandbox. Carve your way through the war-torn lands of Antarctica, Hunt down war machines and Assemble your arsenal of destruction.

name: Undergrown
summary: Explore a 2.5D topdown cave world and craft powerful tools to conquer dangerous biomes, fight giant bosses and save a magical tree from enemy conquership. Experience the thrill of building, fishing, traveling via minecart and farming in this cool survival game.

name: Unsung Ballads
summary: In this indie story-driven RPG deck-builder, embark on an exciting adventure of epic proportions, inspired by the rich folklore of south-eastern Europe.

name: Under Dead
summary: The dead have risen and the living have been forced to take refuge in underground bunkers. Take the role of a hero who fights the undead and saves survivors.

name: Untitled Kirby Game
summary: One of the three different Kirby games in development for the Nintendo GameCube which ended up cancelled. This one is was a 3D action-platformer.

name: Untitled Kirby Game
summary: One of the three cancelled Kirby games for the Nintendo GameCube. This one was a 2D platformer with 2D graphics.

name: Underground
summary: A game featured in Action 52. Tunnel this way and that in order to find the gold. Be careful of the other strange creatures.

name: Underboard
summary: Tactical team-building auto-battler with active and passive playstyles. Draft a team as you explore maps full of monsters, build synergies, equip items and cast spells to support your team during battles and help them escape the Underboard.

name: Unhinged 2
summary: You wake up and find yourself in the midst of a psychotic infestation, and gotta find a way out and avoid being chewed up into a red paste...

name: Ungate
summary: The action is about a young man named Jason, who follows the steps of his friends to find them and to get them out of a mysterious cave that has its own ecosystem and is known by the locals of the West Village as the gate of hell...

name: Undone
summary: The tagline for this short piece of interactive fiction is, "a lifetime of doubts in an instant of self-destruction." Undone unfolds in the moments between two scenes at a research lab in Antarctica. Text and images explore topics in consciousness, organization, physics, and dreams.

name: Uni's On Air
summary: Uni's On Air is a rhythm game featuring songs from Sakurazaka46 and Hinatazaka46. Players can experience various aspects of the real life of idols, communicating with avatars in the “office” area and creating original short stories in the “drama” section.

name: Unrecord
summary: Unrecord is a tactical shooter where players can expect an immersive and narrative experience. Unrecord features complex dialogues, innovative gameplay mechanics, tough moral dilemmas, and a unique shooting system. The storyline in Unrecord can be compared to a detective novel or a thriller. The player will have to investigate several criminal cases and confront a diverse cast of characters. The game's plot and presentation will be central to the gameplay experience, and players can anticipate a range of gameplay sequences as well as numerous plot twists.

name: Underground Blossom
summary: Underground Blossom is an adventure game by Rusty Lake. Fulfil various tasks at every station to find the metro that will take you through each important event from Laura Vanderboom's life.

name: Under the Witch's Trial
summary:
What happens when you transmigrate into a story… where everyone's a villain?

After leaving a critical review of a tropey and grimdark RPG where the main character experiences and perpetuates nothing but tragedy, you… accidentally reincarnate into that very game.

Unfortunately for you, your role is that of a cannon fodder two-bit villain, who exists only for the protagonist to murder in his first act of vengeance against those who've wronged him.

To make matters worse, an alluring villainess offers to help you out—At a price, of course. With both the protagonist's and villainess's eye on you, you must find a way to obtain power and ensure your survival—before it’s too late.

name: Unalive 010
summary: Welcome to the captivating world of Unalive - a game where the hero must battle fierce monsters using their shooting skills. You will navigate randomly generated room labyrinths and face challenging bosses, while mysterious events unfold throughout the game. Be prepared for unpredictable challenges and tests at every turn, creating an immersive atmosphere that draws the player deeper into the world's mysteries and enigmas. Will you be able to unravel all the secrets of Unalive? Only time will tell...

name: Unsupervised
summary: You and your friends were the sidekicks of the world’s greatest heroes. But now that they are gone, will you pick up their mantle or tarnish their legacy?

name: Unboxing the Cryptic Killer
summary: Unravel the mystery of a cryptic box in this 2-player co-op puzzle game. Join forces as two detectives, solve cooperative puzzles, communicate effectively, crack the codes and outsmart the killer.

name: Unnatural: Season Two
summary: Raise a new organization from the ashes of the SRT and guide Silver Cross Incorporated to protect the innocent from the darker side of humanity.

name: Unbroken
summary:
Brave the hostile lands in search of your goal. Forge your own path and discover the many secrets of the realm and the looming Township of Westfall. Unlock new abilities, perks and weapons. Soak in the atmosphere and head forth against all odds.

A mood heavy action-adventure, Unbroken takes players on a grindhouse journey to Crests Edge in search of the traitor Nielsen. With multiple routes to achieve your goal (or even abandon it), the ascent to one of the multiple endings will be a memorable one.

With a unique lore structure and one of a kind audio visual composition, Unbroken will take players on a trip.

name: Unfortunate Tales of Violet
summary: Help the incompetent witch Violet save her homeland in this unfortunate, fast-paced, action adventure title. Draw runes to orchestrate your magic, expand your arsenal of spells, and travel a strange land full of whimsical characters. Oh and also don't mind the owl's jokes, he's always like this.

name: Unicorn Smash
summary:
Unicorn Smash is a relaxing and beautiful Puzzle game. You have to feed baby unicorns by building rows and columns of colourful candy blocks and smash them into rainbow candies.

Unicorn Smash is created for kids, parents and their lovely grandparents to enjoy – it is indeed for the entire family to enjoy. Inspired by one of the most magical animals, the unicorn. It is crafted to help you emotionally re-charge, reduce stress, and just get a time out for yourself.

name: Unmatched: Digital Edition - Soho
summary:
Soho - home to Mr. Edward Hyde, leap from rooftops and work the range to your advantage!

This DLC unlocks Soho - a map for both 1v1 and 2v2 games!

name: Unmatched: Digital Edition - Jekyll & Hyde
summary:
Jekyll & Hyde uses the former's cunning and the latter's brute strength to win the day!
Get them to join you in Unmatched today! This DLC unlocks Jekyll & Hyde - a playable character for Unmatched: Digital Edition!

name: Unmatched: Digital Edition - Invisible Man
summary:
Invisible Man uses fog to dart around the board and strikes without warning!
Get them to join you in Unmatched today! This DLC unlocks Invisible Man - a playable character for Unmatched: Digital Edition!

name: Unmatched: Digital Edition - Baskerville Manor
summary: Baskerville Manor - a home full of mystery and dangers – uses the secret passageways for a sneak attack! This DLC unlocks a Baskerville Manor - map for both 1v1 and 2v2 games with a special "Secret Passages" rule.

name: Unmatched: Digital Edition - Dracula
summary:
Dracula and the Sisters slowly drain you of your power!
Get them to join you in Unmatched today! This DLC unlocks Dracula - a playable character for Unmatched: Digital Edition!

name: Unmatched: Digital Edition - Yukon
summary:
Yukon - wild and mountainous territory, the Yukon makes for a tight fight - beware of getting trapped in a trail loop!

This DLC unlocks Yukon - a map dedicated for 1v1 games!

name: Unmatched: Digital Edition - Sherlock Holmes
summary:
Sherlock, with the trusty Watson by his side, schemes and calculates to ensure victory!
Get them to join you in Unmatched today! This DLC unlocks Sherlock Holmes - a playable character for Unmatched: Digital Edition!

name: Unmatched: Digital Edition - Bigfoot
summary:
Bigfoot and his pal, the Jackalope, crash through the forest for quick attacks before disappearing like a figment of the mind!
Get them to join you in Unmatched today! This DLC unlocks Bigfoot - a playable character for Unmatched: Digital Edition!

name: Unmatched: Digital Edition - Sherwood Forest
summary:
Sherwood Forest - the royal forest in Nottinghamshire, savvy melee fighters can take down even the most skilled ranged attackers!

This DLC unlocks Sherwood Forest - a map dedicated for 1v1 games!

name: Unmatched: Digital Edition - Robin Hood
summary:
Robin Hood and his outlaws excel at ranged attacks and robbing their opponents!
Get them to join you in Unmatched today! This DLC unlocks Robin Hood - a playable character for Unmatched: Digital Edition!

name: Unusual Night Shift
summary:
How bad could a night shift end up?

In this game, you will play as a bouncer for a really exclusive (maybe illegal) underground night club. You are tasked to decide who is welcome, and who is better off searching for another place to have a drink. Everything should go smoothly, until a small mysterious package appears.

This short horror game contains three unique endings.

name: Underground22
summary: 22 people awake and find themselves trapped in a game underground. To win, they must escape the world beneath our feet.

name: Unplug
summary: Explore a dystopian world as a sentient TV Robot who plugs into robot bodies and objects in the environment to control them. Use their different abilities to overcome puzzles, help people and fight off an egomaniac tyrant.

name: Unicyclist
summary: A toy platformer that's easy to learn, hard to master.

name: Underworld: The Shelter
summary:
Through exploration of the cursed shelter, the human race has discovered powerful equipment, resources, and gene-altering data.
Your objective is to harvest these items of great human advancement and return to base safely.
Mankind has underestimated the number of monsters on it's quest for the cursed shelter.
A massive counterattack by the monsters has begun!
Stop the monster's attack that threatens the survival of mankind and stay alive to the end!

name: Unknown Memoirs: The Rental
summary: "Unknown Memoirs" is a short horror game series focusing on distressing tales of horror. "The Rental" centers on the main character moving into a rental that they found online. Little do they know of the horrors that await them.

name: Unioverse Proving Grounds
summary: Unioverse Proving Grounds is a third-person shooter, speedrun mode within our alpha Hero Viewer. Sprint, shoot, slash through fun obstacles and top the weekly leaderboard for rewards.

name: Underwater Cities
summary: The official digital port of the tabletop game which won 2019 Diamant d’Or – top expert strategy game. This digital version adds online multiplayer and AI opponents.

name: Underquest
summary: Cute fantasy roguelite with backpack mechanics. Combine items to create powerful skills and use them in fast-paced combat. Explore randomly generated dungeons in the Underkingdom and discover the secrets of its inhabitants!

name: UnderDungeon: Deluxe Edition
summary: Bundle contains the game + a soundtrack!

name: Unreal World
summary: A hanging up game for material collection and value enhancement

name: UnovaRPG
summary: This MMORPG Pokemon online game is based on the Pokémon Indigo platform. Start capturing wild Pokemon on this MMORPG (X & Y and all generations available), set up your team with up to 6 of them and start battling online with more than +1,000,000 Pokemon Trainers from around the world! Meet new friends (and foes) and show that your team is the best on the battlefield!

name: Unsheltered
summary: Realistic survival simulation game, where players must endure and thrive while managing resources, crafting goods, and overcoming obstacles. The game features modern tools and equipment and the constant threat of nuclear war, adding urgency to the player's journey.

name: Underground Above
summary:
"What you do above
I have seen below."

A narrative driven adventure-horror game about 3 friends who find the entrance to a cave and the decisions they make.

name: Underdogs
summary:
Wrap yourself in 5 tons of metal and go smashing through a dark scene of underground mech fights!

Bash, crush, maul and rip apart enemy bots and mechs - it’s full-on metal-on-metal violence in this first of its kind physics-based mech brawler.

But rampaging through the pits ain’t all - this is a Roguelike.
Gear up with 100+ items including power tools like chainsaws and wrecking balls, hire hackers and saboteurs, hustle and deal with the gangsters and psychos who run these streets as you claw your way up the food chain.

name: Unimime: Unicycle Madness
summary:
"Become a mime!", they said.
"Riding a unicycle is easy!", they said.
I don't like them."

name: Unknown FPV: Drone Simulator
summary: Unknown FPV: The ultimate FPV drone simulator. Master the art of flying in a vibrant, stylized world. Realistic physics, customizable settings, and multiplayer support. Beginners learn, experts escape. Join us on the journey to make FPV simulators great again.

name: Undivine Comedy: Hank's Inferno
summary: A comedy roguelite set in 7 circles of hell. Hack, slash, upgrade and insult your way through numerous enemies. Square off against challenging bosses. Explore hidden paths and find valuable booty. After this you'll never look at hell the same way again.

name: Under Supernova
summary: An instant strategy science fiction simulation survival sandbox game. Players can control individuals, teams, and manage multiple bases. Players can farm, build, excavate, fight, produce, graze, explore, trade, record and pass on knowledge, and can also fly a spaceship to explore the starry sky.

name: Uncaptive
summary: Uncaptive is a sokoban puzzle with a dark horror atmosphere. With the main character, you will pass through a dark dungeon. Each level is a room with a door that takes you further underground. Solve puzzles, go deeper in the dungeon, and investigate what creature lives in this dark place

name: Uncharted 2: Among Thieves: Drake's Fortune Multiplayer Pack
summary:
The Drake's Fortune Multiplayer Pack was a DLC pack that could be bought via the PlayStation Store to be used in the multiplayer of Uncharted 2: Among Thieves. It contained six skins and two new large maps from Uncharted: Drake's Fortune: The Facility and The Flooded Ruins.

It also added 12 new Trophies.

name: Uncharted 2: Among Thieves: Siege Expansion Pack
summary:
The Siege Expansion Pack was a DLC pack that could be bought via the PlayStation Store to be used in the multiplayer of Uncharted 2: Among Thieves. It contained six skins, two new maps ("The Highrise" and "Museum"), and the Siege Co-op Arena Playlist.

It also added 11 new Trophies.

name: Uncharted 3: Multiplayer
summary: Join the Adventure in Uncharted 3: Multiplayer. Download and play Competitive Multiplayer up to level 15 for Free! Access to Cooperative modes, additional Levels, and Game Modes sold separately.

name: University
summary:
In this horror game, you get to guard a school
where a previous killing was taken.

Ever been to a haunted school? well, now’s your chance.

name: Underworld Unfinished Business 1: Recruiting Demon Smalls
summary:
This is a sequel to The Lizard King. This is a fan-made standalone game that uses the Tomb Raider The Last Revelation engine while creating its own story and puzzles.

This TRLE was placed in the trle.net hall of fame in 2005.

name: Underworld Unfinished Business 2: Ghost Train at Castle Orr
summary:
The third entry in The Lizard King series. This is a fan-made standalone game that uses the Tomb Raider The Last Revelation engine while creating its own story and puzzles.

This TRLE was placed in the trle.net hall of fame in 2005.

name: Under the Stars
summary: Battle Survival Game,Explore maps and defeat enemies.Use mouse and keyboard to control the game.There is a loading time when the game starts.

name: Unibat
summary: Real-time strategy Unibat is a game where you build your own kingdom and manage them, train knights and fight against enemy camps of orcs.

name: Underworld Unfinished Business 3: The Plain of Jars
summary:
The fourth entry in The Lizard King series. This is a fan-made standalone game that uses the Tomb Raider The Last Revelation engine while creating its own story and puzzles.

This TRLE was placed in the trle.net hall of fame in 2006.

name: Underworld Unfinished Business 4: Taking Care of Business
summary:
The fifth entry in The Lizard King series. This is a fan-made standalone game that uses the Tomb Raider The Last Revelation engine while creating its own story and puzzles.

This TRLE was placed in the trle.net hall of fame in 2008.

name: Undershadows
summary: Welcome to Undershadows. In this point and click RPG you control a child who has been robbed of his soul and being dragged into a dark world.

name: Underwater Puzzle: Echter Puzzlespass für Unterwegs
summary: Solve puzzles of underwater creatures in different modes to collect stars and to unlock more images.

name: Undead Inc.
summary: Undead Inc. is a high-risk, high-reward resource management simulator where you establish and manage a local subsidiary of the Endswell Medical Corporation. Build, manage staff, conduct research, and trade in both cutting edge medical treatments and bleeding edge bioweapons.

name: Unmanned: Midnight Nightmare
summary: Welcome to Megan’s Mall, the place where dreams come true! It’s your first day on the job as a security guard, and it’s going to be an experience you’ll never forget.

name: Underdose
summary: In a not-too-distant, retro-future world shaken by a shortage of medicine, a talented pharmacist is accused of murdering Patient Zero. He flees to the slums, where he tries to survive in isolation until he can recreate the formula for the drug that will save his life.

name: Unstoppable
summary: The first series of ‘Unstoppable' is a mystery survival game that takes place in the ‘Everway Investment' conducting secret research. Find an antidote, avoid the infected, and uncover hidden stories. Are you ready to escape?

name: Under the Water Depths
summary: Under the Water Depths is a first-person game in which you will dive into a trench in the middle of an unknown ocean. The depths of the sea hide sinister yet mystical secrets.

name: Uncle Slam Vice Squad
summary: Uncle Slam is a touch-based boxing game. You choose your fighter from the Vice Presidents of the United States – some almost great, some with aspirations of near-greatness – and battle your way forth. Can you defeat all your opponents?

name: Uno
summary: A Japanese game adaptation of the Mattel card game Uno, featuring a story mode set in a high school's Uno Club.

name: Unearth
summary: Dig for the bones of your creators in this mashup of Bomberman, Digdug, and Lemmings.

name: Untitled Black Panther Game
summary:
A game involving Black Panther was announced during the 57th anniversary celebration of the character. It was the first project for EA's novel studio, Cliffhanger Games, announced as an original, third-person, single-player Black Panther game in collaboration with Marvel Games.

The project was cancelled in May 2025 following the closure of the studio.

name: Underlevel
summary: Underlevel is a game where you play as a horde of skeletons while a player is raiding the dungeon, trying to get as much XP as they can so they level up and potentially kill the boss at the end - it's your job to stop that from happening. Try your best to rescue all the skeletons, destroy all the loot and keep the player from levelling up before they make it to the final floor.

name: Unsolved Case: The Scarlet Hyacinth - Collector's Edition
summary: It's time to make your choice! A whole series of crimes happens right before your eyes: a murder in an alley, your boss getting shot, abductions in broad daylight, and so on… Can you deal with it all?

name: Unsolved Case: The Scarlet Hyacinth - DLC
summary: It's time to make your choice! A whole series of crimes happens right in front of your eyes: a murder in an alley, the murder of your boss, a kidnapping in broad daylight, and so on... Can you handle it all?

name: Undomestic
summary: Uncover forgotten secrets on a secluded medieval island. Journey through a dynamic world influenced by time and weather. Build, battle, and unravel the enigma. Shape the destiny of this captivating adventure.

name: Underworld Adventures
summary: Underworld Adventures is an excellent 2D adventure game, with RPG elements, in which you need to destroy an ancient evil and free your country from terrible monsters.

name: Unhallowed
summary:
This was meant to be a map of a much larger map pack, but I've decided to focus on another big project instead of focusing on making 1-hour long maps after the other, which was burning me out a little bit.

This is not my style of map usually, I just felt like doing something pretty Sunder-y for once to see if I can manage a grander scale of map without a hitch.

name: Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt: Kimmy vs. the Reverend
summary: It's an interactive Kimmy special! Kimmy's getting married, but first she has to foil the Reverend's evil plot. It's your move: What should she do next?

name: Unreal Strike
summary: Unleash creativity in Unreal Strike's moddable FPS. Engage in intense battles, master gunplay, and explore dynamic maps. Ready to make your mark?

name: Unhappy Cinderella
summary: Included in the Story Me app.

name: Undead Wilderness
summary: Undead Wilderness: Survive the unforgiving jungle, unravel its mysteries, and escape the relentless horde of bloodthirsty zombies. Scavenge, manage resources, and fight for your life in a heart-pounding race against the growing undead threat.

name: Unreachable
summary: A first-person investigative thriller where your family is kidnapped and you must carry out various demands from the kidnapper in order to prolong their lives. However, if you are sharp, you might also uncover clues to track down their location and devise a rescue plan.

name: Undying Fortress
summary: Wield your magic sword against the monsters that fill a mysterious tower, and uncover the secrets of the past!

name: Unsane 2
summary: Unsane 2 is an arcade style FPS. Run and gun or hack and slash your way through open world and dungeon depths on procedural maps. Leader boards track your best scores against zombies, skeletons, and other baddies.

name: Under the Snow
summary: Alex and her father live in a post-apocalyptic world where most of humanity has perished. The world has become a cold, snow-covered place where people communicate with each other at a distance using ground antennas, which frequently malfunction.

name: Unsorted Horror
summary:
UNSORTED HORROR is a collection of 5 short first-person horror games, that revolve around detailed machinery in a dark dystopian setting. The majority of the games have a playtime of roughly 10-15 minutes and can be played through in one sitting. Choose a CD case, read the backside, and go on a small adventure.

THE GAMES:
1. Tartarus Engine - A group of plucky technicians exploit an ancient machine's seemingly untapped vulnerability.
2. The Other Side - Operate a jury-rigged drill to secretly escape a corrupt bunker.
3. Control Room Alpha - Pull data from a nest of spiders.
4. Carbon Steel - Perform hazardous research in an abandoned facility.
5. Concrete Tremor - A game revolving around plastic explosives and soviet apartment buildings.

name: Universal Conquest
summary: 4X/Grand Strategy/RTS Hybrid Space Simulation based on principles - and developed in consultancy with - alien contactees.

name: Unnamed Space Idle
summary: Destroy endless waves of alien ships that have all but wiped out humanity in this long form, unfolding, sci-fi idle game. Customize your ship with different weapons and defenses to defeat specific enemy types and utilize a ton of different systems to increase your overall power.

name: Untitled Star Fox Minihack 2
summary:
Sequel to Sunlit’s Untitled Star Fox Minihack.

One route, 6 Stages, mostly planets. I can’t speak for the difficulty, but if you can beat the original Star Fox, this shouldn’t be terrible. Also lots of added-in dialogue. It was fun to write that stuff.

name: Underworld Defense
summary:
Demons always torture humans. Now, in afterlife, humans has a chance to revenge.
Underworld defense is third person tower defense game in which you have spawning grounds instead towers where you can call your army to help defending your gate.

name: Un Presagio de Huesos
summary:
First part of Un Presagio de Huesos, where the promises of the old witch of the swamp are told and the Hero is presented with the ultimate temptation.

Play, O muse, the story of the futile hero; the story about the struggle against heaven and earth that cost the lives of countless orphans, brought a brother from the abysses of the confines to the borders of the Dream and made the rivers of the continent red.

name: Under Night In-Birth II Sys:Celes
summary:
The first in the series to include rollback netcode, prepare for blistering online matches.
New moves and new battle systems have been added to further evolve the battle.
Experience high-octane battles with ultra high definition pixel graphics.

The tale of the Hollow Night is about to reach its climax...!

name: Unit Down Charge
summary: A futuristic action rail-shooter! Action packed, and full of quirky character dialogues, unique level designs, and epic boss battles!

name: Unease
summary: UNEASE is a 1 to 4 players co-op survival horror game presenting an array of episodes with innovative mechanics and different settings.

name: Unending
summary: A roguelite-puzzle anthology.

name: Under the bed
summary: Under the Bed is a spine-chilling horror game that will take you on a nightmarish journey into the depths of fear.

name: Unreal: Operation Na Pali
summary: Operation Na Pali is a partial conversion for Unreal Tournament by Team Vortex. It - alongside Xidia - brought about a new era of Single Player mapping with brand new textures and architecture styles that would influence many other mappers in years to come.

name: Unbeliever
summary: UnBeliever is a three-episode, vanilla Heretic megaWAD where each episode offers a different gameplay experience and are designed to be played in any order. E1 has lots of gimmicky combat scenarios, mostly focused on Heretic's unique gadgets. E2's maps are ultra short and action- packed, built with only 100 linedefs a piece. And E3's trials require quick thinking and quicker reflexes.

name: [Untitled]
summary: Eight challenging maps build entirely with vanilla resources

name: Uncensor Quest
summary: You are assigned to the special cybersquad unit to deal with a mysterious threat which has begun censoring every piece of erotica it finds online. use your strategy to avoid or destroy the enemies and remove the censorship to complete each level.

name: Underverse Battles
summary: Underverse Battles is a multiplayer turn-based fighting game using the Undertale mechanics. Select your character and fight against other players. Dodge enemy attacks, choose your attacks carefully and win the fight.

name: Uncharted Ocean: Adventures at the Poles
summary: This is a world of oceans, islands and ships. Players will start their own journey from Faro, facing an impermanent ocean and awkward opponents, and gradually build a strong fleet with wisdom and luck. The chaotic seas and tempting treasures, under the guidance of the banner, work hard for survival!

name: Unwelcome
summary: An unsettling journey through a noir-ish set of maps, primarily focused on a grey/blue/pink color theme and each individual map has its own gimmick

name: Untitled Metro Game
summary:
Per 4A Games, the developers behind the Metro series, they have already started work on the next Metro game. "Using everything we’ve learned from the last 15 years, we’ve set our sights even higher – the next title is being built for Gen 9 consoles and PC, with a complete overhaul of our engine and renderer to take advantage of the new power, storage, and hardware supported ray tracing afforded by the new consoles."

"We’re committed to delivering a great story driven single player experience; this is what the Metro series is founded on. As a studio, we want to constantly push ourselves to create bigger and better games, but we also listen to what the fans are saying, and we know what’s important to you. We take our responsibility to the franchise seriously, and we think you’ll be excited about our plans for the next chapter."

4A also has elaborated that they intend to explore multiplayer efforts with future Metro games, but are unsure if the next Metro game will launch with a multiplayer experience, or if these efforts will instead manifest as an independent entry in the future.

name: Underlab
summary: The spiritual successor to Project Winter, Underlab is a mashup of role-playing and social deception set in a secret deepsea laboratory.

name: Undawn: Desert Fury
summary:
In the Desert Fury update, you will get the following:
- New map: Golden Desert
- New story: The Abyss
- New Settlement: Junkyard - Carnival Land for the Owls
- New Roles :Troubadour & Highwayman
- New Events

And much more!

name: Unrestricted Pest Control
summary: U.P.C. is a top-down shooter where you play as a fearless exterminator to solve a small bug problem at a nuclear research facility. With the rogue-lite elements, you must choose your path to the upper floors carefully, while trying to bug fixing in the facility.

name: Unread Messages
summary: Unread Messages is a retro-inspired cyberpunk puzzle game where you deliver texts by making connections between cell towers. Alongside your Ai companion, FASMA, solve confounding levels and uncover the secrets hidden within Simullect Inc's computers.

name: Unloop
summary: Unloop is an elegant, relaxing puzzle game about using clever mechanics to connect and remove portals.

name: Underwater World: DLC Pack
summary: The DLC Pack is an extension to Underwater World - Idle Desktop Colony Building Simulator. Includes additional content.

name: Undercroft Warriors
summary: Crush the forces of hell and get a high score in this addictive, action-packed, arcade-inspired twin-stick shooter!

name: Undercover Speed Dating (with Wolves)
summary: Undercover Speed Dating (with Wolves) is a game where you flirt your way behind wolf-enemy lines. Your mission? To infiltrate wolf speed dating, pee on some fire hydrants and rescue the human they've got trapped in the kitchen.

name: Uncult
summary: 'Uncult' is a pixel RPG where the protagonist, the daughter of a cult leader, suffers from amnesia after an accident in a fanatical pseudo-religious group. Now, she must piece together her obscured past, facing numerous challenges and uncovering the truth. Your decisions will shape her destiny.

name: Undefeated: Genesis
summary: The ultimate superhero experience. Fly freely and unleash your awesome powers as you battle violent mutants to save an alien planet.

name: Unity
summary: Initially announced for the Gamecube in early 2003, the game was cancelled in December 2004. Inability to meet its ambition and scope within a realistic timeframe was cited as a reason by developer Peter Molyneux.

name: Untrusted: Hackers at Large
summary: A single player hacking adventure set in the Untrusted world where you'll be playing as various hackers getting into computer systems to hack, steal and sabotage. Manage your crew, manage your risks, threaten or kill your targets. Investigate. Hack. Don't Die.

name: Unreal Lust Theory
summary: Dive into the seductive world of Unreal Lust Theory, a 3D adult game packed with quests and steamy encounters. Live out your fantasies as a 20-year-old, navigating interactions with a variety of alluring female characters. Embark on a journey where choices lead to thrilling outcomes.

name: Unknown Memories: Lost Reality
summary: Experience the world of liminal spaces from the perspective of a VHS camera. The architecture looks so weird and same. Is it all just a dream? everything is so empty and yet so spooky... where is everyone else? ....

name: Underground Gnome
summary: Underground gnome - is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements. Destroy enemies on the location and complete the set goal to go further along the storyline and collect bonuses.

name: Unexpected Visitors
summary: Step back in time to the 1950s and immerse yourself in a chilling tale shrouded in mystery in "Unexpected Visitors." Play as Barbara Clark, a housewife whose picturesque life takes a nightmarish turn when she returns home to find her children and babysitter mysteriously vanished.

name: Unnamed Experiment
summary: What could be more disorienting than finding yourself in a point-and-click puzzle game with no words at all? You wake up in a cell, surrounded by symbols and traces that make no sense. An atmospheric journey awaits. Immerse yourself in piecing clues together, but don't get lost in the surreal world.

name: Unstable Scientific
summary: Rescue scientists, build your own lab, and discover the secret of Toromiro Island in this intricate pixel art platformer!

name: UnReaMod
summary: Experience Lumina Leap: Leap to the beat of neon through dazzling levels.Master the jumps, shine on the leaderboards.Dive into the light action!

name: Unparalleled
summary: This is a wonderful little game.

name: Untitled Paper Mario Fangame
summary: A playful reimagining of Paper Mario (N64)

name: Unknown Dungeon
summary: Explore randomly generated maze with lots of treasures, puzzles and monsters. Help people, do quests, explore the dungeon, obtain treasures, gain experience and find out the history of the world!

name: Under Siege
summary: This is your realm, and its fate lies in your hands. Each decision you make shapes the story and the world around you. Stand strong, strategize wisely, and defend your castle from the siege.

name: UNC: Pathfinder
summary: UNC: Pathfinder will take you on a journey of psychological horror and personal acceptance. The first of a six game / six ARG series that will test the boundaries of game play and ethics. Fly spaceships, find real-life treasure chests, cry like a baby. Let's do this!

name: Unsolved Case: Above the Law - Collector's Edition
summary: Nothing brings people together as well as a common grief or crime! Can you bravely confront a criminal puppeteer with no legal defense?

name: Unknown Soldier: Mokuba no Houkou
summary: Unknown Soldier, like its predecessor, is a full-3D third person shooter set during World War II, with a simple mission-based structure.

name: Unread
summary: Net Yaroze shooting game.

name: Unfated
summary: An immersive post-apocalyptic MMO. Survive, resist and conquer in a world ravaged by ancient invaders. Form alliances, traverse diverse terrains, and reclaim humanity's destiny with Unreal Engine 5's breathtaking graphics and Chat GPT 4 natural language.

name: Under Pressure
summary: What happens when you make a VR game only about Pressure Washers? From cleaning any object imaginable, playing soccer or volleyball up to flying - Under Pressure is a multiplayer playground that’s all around what you can do with a power washer in your hands.

name: Unoxi
summary: Explore a disparate ruin gripped between the jaws of the universe. Reawaken forgotten knowledge in this twist on a classic sokoban puzzler.

name: Unlimited
summary: Forget the track, skip the turns, and discover what 'speed' really means with Unlimited.

name: Unexpected Consequences
summary: Three years after tragedy struck twice, your new roommates reignite your desire for life, leading to unexpected revelations about your past and a long overdue reunion with one of your oldest and closest friends. Uncover the truth and choose your path to bring those responsible to justice.

name: Unity of Command II: Kursk
summary: It's the summer of 1943, and the Kursk salient marks the westernmost point the Red Army managed to take and hold in the winter campaign. This DLC covers the legendary battle of Kursk from the Soviet side, with a bonus German campaign containing alt-history tracks.

name: Under The Yoke
summary: Under The Yoke is a 2D medieval peasant life-sim. Make your mark in the Domesday book as you control a family of serfs through 250 years of English history. Cultivate your lands, craft goods and hone your reputation as you navigate the tumultuous Middle Ages. Your family’s future is yours to shape!

name: Unavailed
summary: What was once a very promising future, Mia's life has taken a turn for the worse. Now living alone, supported by money from her parents, any aspirations she once had are but a fleeting memory.

name: Unknown Project
summary: Two simple maps that are based on two old drawings I made over ten years ago.

name: Undead West
summary:
Undead West is a western themed roguelite bullet hell where the player uses an array of weapons, whiskey infusions and buffs gained from defeating bosses to complete each stage.

The cowboy you play has been killed in a revolver duel against the Man in Red. Death agrees to resurrect you so that you may carry out your quest for revenge. But there is a catch. Death requests that you pay back your revival debt in souls. Every adversary killed on the road to vengeance grants you a soul that can be used to unlock various new guns to use, as well as whiskey - a mixture used during combat for short boost.

Viewing the action from top down perspective, navigate the hazard filled areas swarming with demons, skeletons and swarms upon swarms of bullets to reach each of the ominous bosses culminating in a fight against the Man in Red.

Shoot your way through enemies, dodge through numerous traps, unlock new guns and whiskey boons as well as colorful outfits in this western noir tinged shooter.

name: Underrail: Heavy Duty
summary: This DLC adds three new weapon types - grenade launchers, machine guns and miniguns, as well as a special high-level side mission that will challenge even the most hardcore Underrail veterans.

name: UnderOneRoof
summary: This is a 10 minute short story game adapted from real events. Players will follow the perspective of the female protagonist, click on items or move through the prompts of the scene and tags, and experience this unexpected family upheaval.

name: Underground Defense Force: Sword and Sorcery and Swarm of Insects
summary: Swarms of giant insects has appeared in the underground world "Agartha"! Defeat swarms of mutated insect monsters with multicast weapons/spells by your own party of customized characters! This is a casual SLG (SRPG) with a focus on exhilaration and hack-and-slash system.

name: Uncontained
summary: Uncontained is a online co-op horror game where players will fight to survive against MUT. Strategies plans as a team and execute accordingly, A Random player will be given control of MUT to seek you out and kill you off one by one

name: Unicorn Overlord: Collector's Edition
summary:
Unicorn Overlord: Collector's Edition includes:
- Base Game
- Outer Box
- Artbook (132 pages)
- 16-bit Arranged Music Album
- Card game (239 cards, players: 2-4, play time: 30-120 minutes)
- DLC Voucher (ATLUS x Vanillaware Heraldry Pack)

name: Undying Memoir
summary:
Undying Memoir is a platforming game with unlockable lore.
This is a fangame based on Touhou Project.

name: Until The Last Bullet
summary: Until The Last Bullet is a unique combination of an FMV and rail-shooter game in which you navigate the winding halls of an abandoned factory, eliminating waves of bloodthirsty mutants.

name: Unispies: Chapter 1 - Havana Cuba
summary: A group of smart, latin american, attractive female hackers steal 2 billion of bitcoin from a communist dictator. Then their lives and family are targeted by the dictator for that crime. The team of girls are rescued by Omar, an ex Mi-6 British agent who runs the Spies for Hire team called Unico.

name: Undead Uprising
summary: "Undead Uprising" immerses you in a post-apocalyptic world swarming with zombies. Battle through endless waves of the undead. Continuously evolving, the game offers regular updates and fresh content. The fate of humanity rests in your hands. Are you ready?

name: Un Lugar Otro Que El Cielo
summary: Large abstract floating ikwhite level. Comes with a new model, sounds, a custom skybox and a music track. The map source is included.

name: Unknown Kadath
summary: Medium-sized 'classic-style' medieval level with a church and lava-filled caverns beneath

name: Unholy Ossuary
summary: Medium-sized classic Episode 3-style runic level.

name: Underwater and Seafaring Duo
summary:
Create and observe Aqua World! Learn more about fish and their behavior and take responsibility for their lives. Control the temperature, environment, and nourishment to provide a suitable environment. Don’t forget to develop your aquarium and after a while, you will be able to open an aquarist shop!

Take control over 3 special purpose naval vessels. Complete various missions on dangerous waters of Baltic Sea.
Take part in recovery of objects from the bottom of the sea. Transport heavy cargo to its final destination, also including rescue and transport missions. Assemble massive naval installations on open waters.

name: Underground Base
summary: Large Base map with spacious rooms, linear progression, a very high monster count and a few custom enemies. Comes with a start and a boss map. Map sources are included.

name: Undesirable Elements
summary: Undesirable Elements is a top-notch space level taking place on Europa, a high-tech outpost for the Earth's elite. Supposedly alien free, they have nonetheless attempted to make a foothold in the base - and as usual it's your job to sort the mess out.

name: Unaided Mission
summary: This is a continuation of Bruise Mining Company. After Duke destroyed Bruise M C. facility,he continues to the secret alien launch area. This must be destroyed!

name: Untold Tales of Citadale: The Shadow Maker
summary: As Gabriel Gorleac enter Citadale Castle and rid the lands from evil in this old-school, top down 2D RPG. Structured like a metroidvania with turn based combat, this adventure is filled to the brim with the undead, beautiful pixel-art locations to explore and eerie melodies to listen to.

name: Uncle Nook's Survivors
summary: Uncle Nook's Survivors is an action rogue-like game. Survive an onslaught of monsters and become the ultimate monster killing machine by upgrading your character with unique weapons and abilities.

name: Unusual Quest
summary: The game is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements. You have to go through many levels, completing certain tasks and destroy enemies in the location.

name: Underwater Life Bundle
summary:
Running an aquarium shop is a real challenge! Clients will entrust you with difficult tasks you have to cope with. In return, a reward awaits you. Intended for business development - buying new fish, exotic plants, a store, or developing skills.

In Deadliest Catch: The Game you will compete in dangerous sea rallies to catch more crabs than you ever thought possible. The task is not simple – it is a battle against time, fishing quotas, crab migrations, and most importantly: the sea. Such is your fate on the Alaskan waters!

name: Underground Waifus TCG
summary: Underground Waifus it's a CCG, Deck Builder TCG with PVP Card Battler F2P Game.

name: Untitled Rougelike Arcade Game
summary: A short arcade roguelike.

name: Uncover the Smoking Gun
summary: "Uncover the Smoking Gun" places you in the heart of a thrilling urban investigation where true detective work awaits. As a seasoned detective, your primary challenge lies in real-time chat interactions with various suspects. This adventure-puzzle game excels in its dynamic dialogue system, where every conversation can shift the course of your investigation. Gathering clues and persuading suspects to unveil the truth requires sharp intuition and cunning strategy. The game also features compelling confession mechanics, demanding players to navigate conversations to extract vital admissions skillfully. "Uncover the Smoking Gun" combines an intricate narrative with immersive environments, promising a gaming experience that keeps you on the edge of your seat as you hunt down the truth.

name: Unknown Presence
summary: Unknown Presence is a first-person adventure horror game where you will witness unexplainable phenomena, from floating orbs to unknown beings. You will explore many locations, from caves all the way up to snowy mountains and everything in between.

name: Undying: Halloween 2023 Free DLC
summary: Join UNDYING now and join other "moms" to get a new "Halloween 2023 DLC" for free!

name: Unleaving
summary: A child is tempted one last time by life's mystery and illusions to journey into a surreal world challenging ideas of everything and nothing

name: Uncharted Lands: Beginning
summary: old school dungeon crawler in pseudo 3d graphics from 90's

name: Unfamiliar
summary: Unfamiliar is a mapping project based around re-imagining the original Doom's maps. Some maps are quickly discernible and others have been reworked extensively to the point of only having a handful of recognizable areas. Maps are designed for standalone gameplay, both continuous or pistol starting.

name: Unwell
summary: You regain consciousness. Beside you lies a broken and rusted ladder, and in front of you stretches a dark, damp-smelling corridor. In the distance, you hear the sound of falling water. You have no idea where you are. All you know is that you must go deeper.

name: United Sects of America
summary: Welcome to the United Sects of America, where a captivating narrative, strategic management, and moral choices seamlessly intertwine. As the leader of your own cult, you'll grapple with tough decisions, shape your group's destiny, and aim to wield influence across the entire United States.

name: Unraveling Angel
summary:
Unraveling Angel is a choice-based adult visual novel following a bisexual male protagonist in a city that struggles to live and breathe. As the player you make choices that lead him into the arms of one the three love interests; Veronika, Matt and Vice.
Pick the path he follows but know that there's only one universal truth. Behind every door lies a world of hurt, including the correct one.

name: Under the Castle
summary: Under the Castle is a classic rogue game where you'll explore infinite dungeons vanquishing enemies, gathering Orbs of Light and rescuing enslaved villagers. Use your weapons, potions, magic scrolls and even you own hat to navigate the treacherous depths and find your way to the Evil Lord!

name: UnDune II: The Demaking of a Dynasty
summary:
A strategy-based resource management simulation, where three houses fight for control of the planet Dune - the land of sand and home of the spice.

It is a demake of the classic (and original) RTS game Dune II, re-created from scratch in PICO-8.

name: Unreal Mashup
summary: Unreal Mashup will test your gaming ability with a solid 3rd person shooter base experience. Fight against bots or join your friends in their personal server automatically created at every login. This high pace futuristic shooter is Fast!

name: Undergod
summary: Take over heaven in this airborne-combat roguelike where you fight hordes of angels while growing stronger every minute.

name: Universal Power
summary: Universal power is a fantasy RPG game designed and published by Martia Nouri Namini.

name: Unwelcome
summary: Unwelcome is an 80s-themed survival horror game where you take the role of a night guard at Silver Valley Nature Park, but what starts off as a peaceful job spirals into a dreadful night of hiding from a murderer.

name: Unforgotten: Ordinance
summary: Face your fears, uncover the secrets of the past and fulfill your own destiny. In the wild impenetrable forests of Siberia you will face those who look beyond our reality and only the right choice will allow you to reach the end. Test yourself in a new psychological ethno-horror.

name: Unternity
summary: A map pack of short, linear maps. Episode One is Underclaustro, underground maps which you'll see skybox less often, hence claustrophobic. Episode Two is Unlifely, Snow maps, out doors, concrete building surrounded by heavy snows.

name: United Football
summary:
United Football is a free to play, multiplayer, 5-a-side online football game.

United Football allows players to play in teams consisting of both human and AI players and boasts a unique control system and viewpoint that puts the gamer right in the action.

name: United Penguin Kingdom: Huddle up
summary: This free version of the United Penguin Kingdom covers the content from one-year in-game time. A city-building game where you build a penguin settlement and satisfy the various needs of your penguins while dealing with seals and killer whales.

name: Under Night In-Bright II Sys:Celes - Deluxe Edition
summary:
Under Night In-Bright II Sys:Celes - Deluxe Edition contains:

- Under Night In-Bright II Sys:Celes - Deluxe Edition
- Under Night In-Bright II Sys:Celes - Deluxe Edition - Season Pass
- 25 Announcer Characters set

name: United Penguin Kingdom
summary: A city-building game where you build a penguin settlement and satisfy the various needs of your penguins while dealing with seals and killer whales. Enjoy the growth of your settlement, become the king, and lead the United Penguin Kingdom.

name: Undead Mayhem
summary: Undead Mayhem is a survival horror fps game where you will try to survive for as long as possible while fighting waves of bloodthirsty monsters coming to kill you!

name: Undertale: Mad Mew Mew Port
summary: Undertale: Mad Mew Mew Port is an Undertale fangame by DeadDuck. The game is a recreation of the Mad Mew Mew boss battle from the Nintendo Switch version of Undertale, making it playable on both PC and Android.

name: Unknown Variable 2: Raven's Ridge
summary: The second game in the Unknow Variable game series, in the game the young group of invertigators (Mike, Adela, Tyler & Keisha) got to investigate Raven's Ridge Park.

name: Until the Last Plane 1942
summary: Soar across the skies of World War II in this vertical shootem'up. Duel enemy fighters, strike critical targets and choose your wingmen wisely. The year is 1942, and the odds are against you.

name: Unline
summary: Welcome to the Bizarre Kingdom! A place full of strange creatures and places.... Even a colourful world has a dark side, remember that it is you who choose their fate.

name: United States of America Jigsaw Puzzles
summary: "Explore USA's beauty in Jigsaw Puzzles! Solve iconic scenes, unlock breathtaking views, and experience America's charm. Choose your challenge and enjoy a captivating tribute to the nation's splendor!"

name: Undead: Rise of Betrayed King
summary: Undead: Rise of the Betrayed King - is an engaging role-playing game where players, assuming the roles of both a dragon and a human, battle against an awakened ancient evil. The game offers unique capabilities for the dragon to explore the world and engage in battles.

name: Unrailed 2: Back on Track
summary: Unrailed is back on track with more co-op railroad construction chaos! Choose your path in a new world packed with bold biomes and bosses. Permanently upgrade your character and engines, even create and share your own levels - just don‘t let your train derail!

name: Unrivaled Heroes
summary: Prepare your 2.5 D beat 'em up side scroller battle for a challenging adventure in medieval aesthetic folklore, where players can learn ancient martial art skills in a progression chapter story to experience the true adrenaline rush from mythical heroes!

name: Under Cover
summary: Under Cover is a return to the golden age of lightgun games that takes the same thrilling arcade action those games delivered and uses the power of VR to surround you with enemies in a way that the arcade cabinets that paved the way for Under Cover never could.

name: Undertale: No More Deals
summary: A fanmade continuation of the Undertale genocide route, featuring a boss battle against Chara.

name: Undying: Skin Pack - Series 1
summary: Welcome to Undying Skin Pack - Series 1! Download it now, and add a touch of fun to the hard life of survival for mother and child!

name: Untamed
summary: Untamed is a planned multiplayer creature survival game that takes place in a post apocalyptic world full of overgrown ruins.

name: Unveiling
summary: Experience the UFO abduction in first person and take a trip to meet thy keeper. Explore layers of reality and learn what is concealed behind the modern Unidentified Anomalous Phenomenon (UAP) in this esthetic and eerie interactive experience.

name: Unbeatable Professional me with 100 Girlfriends
summary: Since I was a child, I learned the skills of my family, but I didn't expect an unexpected trip. Let me rely on my vocational skills alone to create a bond with many, many sisters!

name: Undertale: True Genocide
summary: Undertale: True Genocide is an Undertale fan-made game that takes place at the end of your genocide route in the original Undertale. True Genocide is a more story-driven fangame than your typical "press fight button to win" with you having to strategically ACT your way out of battles.

name: Underfell: One Hell of a Show
summary: An Underfell Fan-Game containing multiple battles! Fight against Mettaton, the killer robot with a penchant for stardom, who hopes to finally become popular with his most daring act yet: killing a human!

name: Unaccomplished
summary: Unaccomplished is a Yume Nikki fangame. Yin Ming wakes up on his balcony in the midst of a thunderstorm. He is unable to leave his room due to it, so all he has left to do is sleep, and dream. The player explores the dream world and collects effects that change Yin Ming's form and grants him new abilities.

name: Under the Wakzoo
summary:
Under the Wakzoo is side view and Roguelite Shooter game. This game is a fan game by YouTuber Woowakgood.
You can obtain various items and guns. Fight monsters in the underground to obtain items and progress through stages by defeating bosses. Ultimately, you must defeat the final boss to save the world.

name: Uncrowned
summary: Set sail in Uncrowned, an age of sail adventure where you command a struggling colony under an oppressive monarchy, and chart a course towards independence. Will you seek fortune through cunning trade or brandish the sword as a fearsome pirate? Your choices shape the destiny of your people.

name: Unilife
summary: A survival RPG set in a post-apocalyptic world. Confront waves of enemies, enhance your character and gear, and fortify your base. Explore, gather resources, and tackle the ultimate challenge of survival in this immersive game.

name: UnDuster
summary: UnDuster is a fast-paced ultrafastidious retro platformer combining the skill-based dashing from mountain climbing with unadulterated blasting inspired by the best rocket jumping of the '10s. Make your way through multiple areas with varied challenges and collect their stickers to attain your glory.

name: Underground secret
summary: This is a strategy game with a cartoon style square grid that looks very fresh and cute, and the exciting background music is exhilarating.

name: Undeads
summary: Embark on a risky but exciting journey through the world of Undeads. Search for weapons, armor, supplies and medicine. Survive or hunt survivors. Enjoy unique matches, sell your loot, and fight bloody and challenging battles against the background of the zombie apocalypse!

name: Under The Mask
summary: You will become a returnee from the underworld whose soul resides in a mask. Extract the mask, explore the surrounding area, encounter events, and continuously become stronger! At the end of time, use the masks you collected to give the final enemy a fatal blow! ! !

name: United States of America Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 1
summary: "Explore the beauty of the United States with 'USA Jigsaw Puzzles.' Piece together iconic scenes, from cityscapes to natural wonders. Choose your difficulty, unlock panoramic views, and enjoy stunning artwork.

name: United States of America Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 2
summary: "Explore the beauty of the United States with 'USA Jigsaw Puzzles.' Piece together iconic scenes, from cityscapes to natural wonders. Choose your difficulty, unlock panoramic views, and enjoy stunning artwork.

name: United States of America Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 3
summary: "Explore the beauty of the United States with 'USA Jigsaw Puzzles.' Piece together iconic scenes, from cityscapes to natural wonders. Choose your difficulty, unlock panoramic views, and enjoy stunning artwork.

name: United States of America Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 4
summary: "Explore the beauty of the United States with 'USA Jigsaw Puzzles.' Piece together iconic scenes, from cityscapes to natural wonders. Choose your difficulty, unlock panoramic views, and enjoy stunning artwork.

name: Unknown Memoirs: Stormy Night
