summary: "Unknown Memoirs" is a short horror game series focusing on distressing tales of horror. "Stormy Night" sets the player in a world where an unnatural storm has been going on for days. As the player explores the world around them, things start to take a turn towards the unnatural.

name: Unknown Soul With Me
summary: This is a game where you play as a young girl abandoned in a dungeon. who was saved by a mysterious spirit The spirit introduced himself as having lived in this place. But can't go anywhere The young girl wanted to set this soul free. They worked together to find a way out of this place.

name: Underminer
summary: Welcome to Underminer, an underground adventure game set in a subterranean world. Mine minerals, earn money, upgrade your drill machine and descend deeper into the earth. The truth about 'legendary minerals' and an exciting underground world are waiting for you!

name: Unbeatable Professional Me With 100 Girlfriends!
summary: I started a part-time job with my hard-working personality and earned money to buy gifts for my favorite characters.

name: Uncovered: 1945
summary: Immerse yourself in an exiting World War II Story about Hitler Secret Bunker and what does he leave behind, Get ready for a new Jurney of exploration and Uncover the Secrets of the bunkers. Will you be able to succeed?

name: Until It’s Undone: Unmastered
summary: A forgotten oldie returns with a full makeover. Control some lost idiot by typing commands. Unmake puzzles to progress. Bump into several lovely weirdos along the way. Discover a wonderland of disturbing nonsense and industrial amounts of sarcasm.

name: Unheim
summary: UNHEIM is a psychological horror surveillance game of exceptional difficulty in which you must not only report anomalies, but also learn to survive paranormal attacks. Every night is a fight for survival against lurking horrors.

name: Unicorn Overlord: Monarch Edition
summary:
From the masterminds that brought 13 Sentinels: Aegis Rim, Odin Sphere, and Dragon's Crown, ATLUS x Vanillaware presents the rebirth of tactical fantasy RPG. Fight against fate and embark on a royal adventure to regain your reign alongside trustworthy allies.

Unicorn Overlord combines the timeless tactical RPG genre with overworld exploration and innovative battle system for a unique epic fantasy experience in the iconic Vanillaware style.

name: Undiscovered Technology of the Pharaohs
summary: Undiscovered Technology of the Pharaohs is a map pack using a new yet unreleased Alkaline devkit. It features 3 egypt/techbase themed maps (start, main map, end).

name: Undertale: Chara Boss Fight
summary: A fanmade Undertale boss fight of Chara.

name: Until Dawn
summary:
A remake of Until Dawn, an interactive drama survival horror video game originally released in 2015.

The remake features overhauled visuals, new camera controls, prologue rework, new collectables, new areas and interactions, and a new "Stay Calm" mechanic.

name: Under A Star Long Cold
summary: You have 30 minutes to loot this place and pay your debts before the planet is destroyed. Intense stealth-action with permadeath. An exploration of agency and hope.

name: Un-Seelie
summary: Unseelie is a single player conversion for Half-Life 2 that engages the player in a third person action-adventure quest to save a magical forest overrun with evil Unseelie. Using the elemental abilities of fire and ice, the player beats back the Unseelie and their blight infestation. The player uses knowledge of the elements to pass through environmental puzzles and destroy enemies.

name: Undulations
summary: This is a survival escape action game from a huge wave where you can experience fear and despair within the first minute. The goal is to run around freely in 3D space from a first-person perspective and avoid large waves. The joy of conquering a huge wave is immeasurable.

name: Uncle Clyde's Consonant Slides
summary:
Uncle Clyde's Consonant Slides is a single-player game to help children learn consonant sounds.

The player chooses from 3 lists of different consonant sounds, and there are four different question types. The player receives animated quizzes where they try to correctly identify the missing consonant starting a word.

name: Unnamed Project
summary: Unnamed Project is a game about playtesting. You are the player, who’s job is to explore a game developer’s projects and touch everything possible. Touching any and everything will help the game developer in every way possible, so don’t listen to their concerns. Thanks ahead of time.

name: Unmasked: An Inner Journey
summary: Unmasked: An Inner Journey is an immersive 2D action-adventure platformer with no dialogue. According to the game story, the player gets into the main character's consciousness and fights with inner fears and memories. The gameplay is a mix of running, jumping, combat, puzzle and boss fights.

name: Unheroic Misfits
summary: Experience charming, whimsical characters and worlds juxtaposed with themes such as loss and mental illness in this story-driven RPG Maker game where you play as Loo, an insect-like humanoid trying to save their friend before it's too late.

name: Universe Has No Favorites
summary: Text-based point & click SCI-FI adventure game. As an escaped prisoner with an erased memory and unknown implants in his head, you navigate a dangerous world of the technological underworld on the edge of the civilized universe, uncovering a terrifying mystery that could destroy all of humanity.

name: Unreality
summary: Welcome to Unreality, a unique experience that will immerse you in a fascinating journey through the cosmos. In this platformer game, you will embark on an odyssey alongside our light particle, facing thrilling challenges as you explore beautiful vistas of planets and galaxies.

name: Unholy Village
summary: Joseph and his two friends set out for their village to attend his sister's funeral. However, they strangely have an accident on the way. After the accident, Joseph's friends go missing. While trying to find his friends in an abandoned town, Joseph encounters strange events.

name: Unknown Tapes
summary: You are the prey. Unknown Tapes is a horror video game that employs the found footage technique to narrate a story focused on survive in a modern setting overrun by dinosaurs. It aims for realism and draws inspiration from Dino Crisis and Outlast.

name: Universe
summary:
Universe is a Shoot 'em Up fan game for the PC released in 2023.
Inspired by the Gradius games and taking advantage of modern day hardware, it pushes its formula forward, rivalling the quality of the original entries as well as challenging long-time players of the series.

name: Untitled Wave Race: Blue Storm Sequel
summary: Nintendo Software Technology worked on a pitch for a new game in the Wave Race series, but the project was not accepted to be completed and released, only some patents on the technology used are public.

name: Unknown Tank Game
summary: Unknown Tank Game is an unofficial name given to an untitled tank game developed by JimsToy in the 1980s for the Atari 2600.

name: Unknown place
summary: Escape Unknown place.

name: Underrun
summary: A twin stick shooter in 256 shades of brown.

name: UntilZombieDown
summary: "Until Zombies Down" is a top-down roughlike shooting game.Eliminate zombies in different environments and locations.Whether day and night or blizzards and sandstorms.Upgrade yourself in action,buy items to improve your system.Complete the goal and come back alive to earn rewards.

name: Under Night In-Birth II Sys:Celes - 25 Announcer Characters
summary: This products unlocks the "Announcer Character Pack - 25 Characters" DLC content upon activation. The in-game announcer voice can be changed through the Customize menu.

name: Under Night In-Birth II Sys:Celes - Season Pass
summary: This product unlocks the playable character "Kuon" DLC content upon activation, as well as three additional playable characters in the upcoming Season Pass and new story content scheduled for release at a later date.

name: Unolingo
summary: Have fun trying to survive the unolingo office where Uno is hunting you. Spooky owl is very spooky.

name: Unilateral Table Tennis
summary: A Breakout or Pong inspired game in which the player controls a paddle trying to break through a layer of blocks on the top of the screen.

name: Unreal Physics
summary: Unreal Physics is a exploration of in-game physics like never before, this dynamic 3D sandbox features a mesmerizing collection of demos, showcasing stunning visuals and realistic simulations. It's a playground of endless possibilities where creativity meets the cutting edge of physics technology

name: Unsolved Case: Killer Popularity - Collector's Edition
summary: Criminals have discovered tons of innovative ways to keep a low profile. Your move, Detective!

name: Unspoken
summary: You find yourself in the center of inexplicable nightmare. Make your way through the horror, come face to face with terrible events. Immerse yourself in the dark mystery of the events in which you found yourself an unwitting participant.

name: Untethered
summary: Stranded in deep space, you must survive against all odds. Scavenge from wreckage, process resources, and build your own space station - a refuge in the most hostile of environments.

name: Untimely Hidden: Patara
summary: Our Time Agent Jaxon has a new mission: his arch-nemesis has stirred things up again. Now he should follow her to the ancient city of Patara and find the modern-day objects scattered around the city that she left behind.

name: Underwater world
summary: This is an adventure game that requires testing your eyesight and skills.

name: Underdog
summary: UNDERDOG is a puzzle game with a dark story set in a city of wolves.

name: Uncle Z
summary: Survive the zombie apocalypse with friends, managing resources, facing infected, and caring for your elderly uncle. Explore strategies, action, and chaos in a post-pandemic world. Challenge yourself in a unique survival game.

name: Uncanny Valley: Machine
summary: UNCANNY VALLEY:MACHINE is a story about a guy who leaves his apartment the first time after nightmarish creatures resembling a mixture of man and machine invaded the city in which he lives. Immerse yourself in the story, save the girl, find salvation in the streets illuminated by green moon.

name: Unlock
summary: A group of passwords in front of you, with no way forward. Impossible to solve.

name: Undying Harvest
summary: The pesky undead are after your crops! Do you have what it takes to defend your farm against these hordes of undead?

name: Uninhabited Island
summary: join us now!

name: Universe Millionaire: The New Era of Energy
summary: Classic mechanics of Monopoly game Different characters have different abilities and carry their own missions The game gradually increases in difficulty, requiring good strategic planning and resource management skills, as well as the courage and wisdom to deal with various events. The open ending

name: Unknown Signal
summary: Unknown Signal is a 3D adventure game. You have received a mysterious signal and you have to find out what or who sent it.

name: Unlinked Mask
summary: Unlinked Mask is a videogame inspired by the Game Boy but with touches of elevated difficulty. Viewer has been called by the gods to enter the People's Lands, lead his way and overcome the challenges!

name: Unlock the Three
summary: Unlock the Three is about a Police,Medic,Security Worker and a Father trying to escape from a monster in locked hospital. Monster is also controlled by a player and each survivor has its own unique skills to perform.Survivors must be collaborate with each other to be able to escape.

name: Unparalleled: Zero
summary: Smash into year 2313 as an unemployed Rock Giant who gets an opportunity from the nefarious mega monopoly. Will you sign the contract? Actions have consequences. Push foes into the abyss, combine the elements, and time your hits in this Platformer RPG with Turn-Based Combat and Physics.

name: Unsolved Case: Killer Popularity DLC
summary: Every reckless decision can turn into a perfectly planned crime. Criminals have discovered tons of innovative ways to keep a low profile. Your move, Detective!

name: Undeliverable
summary: Arcade style fast paced driving and delivery game where you drop off packages, mail, food, or people at their destinations.

name: Unou Paradise
summary:
A game that cracks in the tired right brain appears!
"Unou Paradise" is a game that fun to play and check the ability of the "right brain" that controls human intuition, inspiration, creativity, and image. Check the ability of the "right brain" while doing various tasks (games) such as quickly counting the animals in the herd and instantly picking up the same picture as the sam. There are 8 types of assignments (games) included. It is equipped with an "exam" mode that is conducted through all assignments and a "practice" mode that allows you to play only one type of assignment.

name: Unyverse
summary: Unyverse is a sci-fi, action role-playing game (ARPG) created by Afrime Studios. Unyverse delivers an immersive, story-driven gameplay experience for single and co-op players enriched by a deep Afro-Futuristic aesthetic.

name: Unstrayed
summary: Detect anomalies and survive in a space module! Can you break the experiment loop and reveal all the secrets?

name: Un/Fragment
summary: A short 10 minute visual novel about being a fragment in the universe and trying to find a way out of the ****.

name: Under Walls
summary: Explore randomly generated levels, collect treasures, and evade monsters. Play solo or with up to 6 players online. Customize your space between matches.

name: Uncle's Basement
summary: Are you trapped in a small dark room and want to get out? You don't have much time, so hurry up! Oh, and good luck!

name: Unknown Signal: Invasion
summary: Unknown Signal: Invasion is a continuation of the exciting sci-fi game. This time you have to go to the space station to investigate a new mysterious signal coming from an unknown source.

name: Under the Tree
summary: Battle over two dozen unique monsters as you penetrate deeper and deeper into Ugnet's Dungeon, leveling up, learning new Spells, and becoming more powerful in the process.

name: Untitled Zombie Game
summary: Joburg city’s population has turned into zombies. To save his mother a taxi driver has teamed up with an unlikely group to save u’mama.

name: Unread Messages
summary: Help texts get to their destinations by drawing connections between cell towers. This is the Ludum Dare 53 version of the game.

name: Untitled Dungeons & Dragons Game
summary: A game by Gameloft in developement for PC and consoles.

name: Unseen: 2002
summary: An ordinary home video from 2002 takes a terrifying turn as you get lost in the Backrooms.

name: Untraveled Lands: Chantico
summary: Explore the wild depths of "Untraveled Lands: Chantico" a captivating card-based survival management game mixed with roguelike elements. Build a village, manage survivors, craft essential items and equipment. Unravel jungle mysteries to find your way home through a world lost in time.

name: Underpowered Night Spooks
summary: Underpowered Night Spooks is a racing game that takes place in Japan in the early 1990s. Challenge a friend or an online player to a one-to-one race on tough courses where any distraction can cost your victory.

name: Unreal Trail: In the name of the Strongest, 30 Hunters Forced to Evolve
summary: Unreal Trail: In the name of the Strongest, 30 Hunters Forced to Evolve is a turn-based light meat pigeon game set in the land of aerial fantasy. Choose your current round of battle hunters, battle after the victory to strengthen, until the end of the level, unlock new characters!

name: Unearthed VR
summary:
Battle with bears and protect your cubs, become a prowling jaguar, shrink in size to protect your fishy family from marauding piranhas, and even ride beetles into gigantic Amazonian flowers! Unearthed is a funny, impactful and inspirational adventure into the wild like never before, using incredible animal superpowers to find the missing Professor and save the world!

Harness your predator powers, your bow and arrows, and bio scanner in an attempt to complete your vital missions.

Don’t worry, you won’t be alone in this mission. On the journey are your haphazard robot guides, voiced by Richard Ayoade (Soul, The Mandalorian) and Sian Clifford (Fleabag) and the Professor, played by Indira Varma (Game Of Thrones, Obi Wan) as you travel through epic Amazon and Alaskan forests.

These robots will help you collect the animal and plant information you need to find the Professor. They believe she holds the key to protecting these ecosystems and saving the world... the rest is up to you.

name: Under The Whisper
summary: You are a curious and brave mother cat, a furry tabby with a heart of gold and an adventurous nose looking for the best gift.

name: Undead City
summary: After a global pandemic, humanity has to survive against hordes of zombies in the “Undead City”. Set in a post-apocalyptic world crawling with zombies and raiders. This action packed FPS game throws players into intense battles.

name: Unstable Cylinder
summary: This is a platformer action adventure in which the main character, trapped inside a long cylinder prison, attempts to escape. Escape by climbing over steep walls, a turbulent world, moving scaffolding, and other obstacles! Of course, it would be infinitely close to impossible.

name: Undertale Red & Yellow
summary: Have you played Undertale Yellow? After completing it, did you think: "Man, I really wanna replay Undertale now, but I've already played it so many times..." No? WELL TOO BAD! Introducing: Undertale Red & Yellow! An Undertale mod designed to scratch that Undertale Yellow itch!

name: Uncompromising Mode
summary: Uncompromising Mode (often shortened to "Uncomp" or "UM") was created with the goal of revitalizing the difficulty of DST. The mod adds randomness, variety, and challenge to the game's core mechanics, without making the experience annoying and tedious. However, it isn't simply just "a harder experience". Uncompromising Mode houses a lot of new content such as new mechanics, items, mobs, biomes, and bosses.

name: Unreal Island
summary: This is a delightful cartoon astronaut game!

name: Unscripted Fate
summary: The protagonist is Alex, who comes from a poor family and by this reason, from an innocent child ends up being part of a criminal organization from a young age.

name: Universe Size Comparison VR
summary: How does an atom look like compared to a planet? How big is the Milky Way compared to other galaxies? In this simple application you have the opportunity to see and compare the real sizes of various objects in our Universe, from atoms to galaxies.

name: Unfolded Cube
summary: Let's solve a scrambled cube in its unfolded state. Manipulate the cube pieces of a randomly mixed cube to solve it.

name: Unrest
summary: Choose your side in the futuristic struggle between colonist humans and resistant alien creatures. Prove who is superior in adrenaline-filled space battles with a unique gameplay experience!

name: Unihorn
summary: Cute, funny and with one horn - that is an Unihorn. Welcome to the very first unicorn climbing game!

name: Unbreaded
summary: Unbreaded is a side-scrolling adventure game where you navigate a gingerbread man through a bakery battleground, blending puzzle-solving with dynamic combat against animated kitchenware, all set within a heartfelt story of creation and rebellion against industrialization.

name: Undead Tower Defense
summary: Where the player will have to defend the location by placing towers and withstand waves of attacking enemies. In this 3D game, you will find yourself facing the task of repelling hordes of skeletons and monsters.

name: Undefeatable
summary: Accurate gunplay, high-speed movement with lots of expression, and character customization. What more could you want in an arena shooter, and what more does it take to become undefeatable?

name: Undusted: Letters from the Past
summary: Undusted: Letters from the Past is a casual game focused on restoring dirty items to their pristine state. Use a variety of tools to return objects to their original appearance. As you clean each item belonging to the protagonist, reflect on the significance and stories behind them.

name: Uneasy Memories
summary: A Psychological Horror Game Set in Everyday Life

name: Untei DX
summary:
A remastered version of Burari Sekai Untei.

Travel around the world by moving through the mountains that surround the earth!
Endless one-touch action is now available in deluxe form!

The running bar may be missing or someone walking on it may step on it, so use double jumps and single jumps to avoid it.
The goal is to circumnavigate the globe, but the game continues even after achieving the goal until you make a mistake, so how many times can you circumnavigate the globe? Let's try it!

2015/12 New mode “Bralympics” released!

Note: This work is a renewed version of "Burari World Untei" which was distributed until June 2015.

name: Uncle's Basement: Collector's pack
summary: The DLC adds 22 items to be found. Find all the items, you will get the achievement in the main game.

name: Unnatural Selection
summary: Four Player Party-Shooter Featuring Cute Animals Wielding Wacky Guns! Play as animals and fight your friends to win the tournament, eliminating the most players to win the round!

name: UnderMine 2
summary: Delve back into the heart-pounding depths of the Undermine in this action roguelike sequel! Uncover ancient secrets, battle fierce foes, and conquer Delvemore Castle with a friend by your side!

name: Unity Heroes
summary:
First person shooter

A classic first-person perspective game.

Defeat all enemies

It will be cleared when you shoot a star.

name: Unsung Empires: The Cholas II Legacy of Rajendra Chola
summary: Take control of Rajendra Chola, and uphold the legacy of your kingdom amidst challenges, battles, and tough decisions in this narrative-driven action-adventure game. Will you honor its heritage or forge a new path? Your leadership will shape the destiny of Thanjavur.

name: Underworld Overseer
summary: Become the master of your dungeon, command your army of demons, expand your territory, place strategic traps and defeat waves of adventurers with your powerful spells.

name: Unknown Seas
summary: Explore the unknown procedurally-generated world of islands and seas. Fight enemies, farm materials, craft equipment, build your base, slay bosses and level up your character. Conquer the unknown with your friends.

name: Unable to Exit 8
summary: You receive an invitation on a "special" dating app. After getting excited, you get involved in an infinite loop in a couple's hotel. You must carefully observe all the anomalies, and the answer to the mystery is waiting for you on the 30th floor.

name: Unfinished
summary: a game, in pixel art.

name: Unbroken
summary: Unbroken is a Sports Simulation Roleplay Action Game with Pro Kick Thai Boxing Elements. Create a newbie and become a Superstar, get the golden cup and fight your way to the top. Not only is it a sports game, but there are also more mini-games and surprises waiting for you.

name: Universe Wars
summary: Universe Wars is a multiplayer game similar to Plants vs. Zombies. Plants become evil Earthlings, and zombies become cuddly three-eyed aliens. And on the basis of "Plants vs. Zombies" and increased the multiplayer online, fashion system, formation evolution, protagonist system.

name: Unlimited Worlds
summary: 类roguelite的无限流3D像素游戏

name: Uncutetifying Danny
summary: Your cute best friend, Danny, is sick of being called cute, so he needs your help to make him look cool! Your advice is important to him, so he'll change his appearance based on what you say. Will you be able to successfully turn him uncute?

name: Underhaul
summary: Look into the new world , "Underhaul" A game about a girl protecting her grandma's life by collecting strawberries in order to create the best medicine for her. Help her in order to succeed in preventing the death of her grand mother.

name: Unending Dawn
summary: The anime open-world action RPG "Unending Dawn" under development by Chinese studio Parcae’s Fate Studio. it will launch for PlayStation 5, iOS and Android.

name: University of the Dead
summary: You're a research student at university looking to find the cure for a mysterious disease. Life seemed pretty normal on campus with your friends Lucas, Martin and Brian. But one night, when you stay late working on your research, you hear a scream. You go to see what's going on... only to find a monster eating a student! You manage to escape, but you decide to get to the bottom of this mystery with your 3 friends. As you dive deeper, you learn of a secret that will change the world forever. Could this be the beginning of a zombie apocalypse...?

name: Undead Lovers
summary: In a distant future, a zombie infection spreads internationally and the world is nearing a full-blown apocalypse.You, the heroine, are part of a group being lead by Tsubasa Kisora and are surviving. James, a new comer, and researcher apparently has save the day, after Tsubasa and Jack got bitten one day; but the researcher has his own goal and what is the destiny of your team?

name: Universal Constellation
summary: Universal Constellation is a Rom Hack for Super Mario 64, which is aiming to be the biggest SM64 Rom Hack ever made, with 832 total stars in its final release.

name: Unconditional Fate's Season 1 Wrap Up!
summary: A short game made to celebrate the completion of season 1 of the webcomic, Unconditional Fate, which is based on "The Little Mermaid" by Hans Christian Anderson. Season 1 Wrap Up reveals some untold stories of the characters that live within Unconditional Fate's universe. Made in RPG Maker the game features both puzzles and visual novel segments.

name: Under Canopies
summary: Under Canopies is a serene exploration and survival experience. Set your own pace as you immerse yourself in activities like building and decorating your cabin, animal husbandry, crafting delicious meals, and uncovering the hidden secrets and valuable resources scattered throughout nature.

name: Undercroft
summary: Under the old forgotten church lies a sprawling crypt, filled with lost histories and abandoned secrets. Search through the forgotten catacombs and uncover the mystery behind it's creation. Maybe you can find out how to save yourself along the way.

name: Unfeigned Depths
summary: Unfeigned Depths is a narrative focused first-person psychological thriller. Through the eyes of Adam, understand the true nature of your dreams with fully voiced dialogue and dynamic events. As the lines between trust and deception are blurred, can you uncover where reality ends and dreams begin?

name: Unclogged
summary: Unclogged is a puzzle horror escape game. Collect items, solve puzzles, unclog the toilet, and hopefully make an escape.

name: Undead Onslaught
summary: "Undead Onslaught" is a Bullet Heaven RPG where you ascend as the villain. Master unique mechanics and strategic combat to dominate a dark, evolving world.

name: Underground: World War
summary: A brand new game inspired by the Def Jam series. Create your own fighter or play as some of your favorite rappers in this over the top fighting game

name: Unearthing Invasions
summary: A 3d tower defense game set in space. Protect the last resource outposts from the ongoing Alien attacks! Can you hold out in these ever increasing difficult waves of enemies and protect the last of your resources and Energy?

name: Unpossess
summary: Unpossess is a 1-4 co-op exorcism simulator game set in the early 1900s. Players take on the role of exorcists responsible for addressing cases of human possession.

name: Unknown Rules
summary: Unknown Rules is an independently created multiplayer online horror game that supports 1-4 players.

name: Undersea 8
summary: You are trapped in a dangerous undersea ruin. Let's escape from the deep sea with observation and quick situational judgment.

name: University Days: Season 1
summary: Step into the shoes of a Student at an all-but-ordinary University, where there seems to never be a dull day with hot women around every corner. Just so happens that you could just be the most wanted guy at this University... Who will you fall for?.. And who will fall for you?

name: Undead Kingdom Survivors
summary: Prepare to face the relentless onslaught of the undead! Clear the undead realm either solo or with up to 2 friends in online multiplayer. Choose powerful abilities to vanquish hordes of undead. Upgrade stats and unlock new heroes as you strive for survival in this intense roguelite bullet hell.

name: Unsought
summary: Unsought is a 360° subjective exploration, panoramic horror adventure game. It takes place in a provincial town in 1990s Japan. You are an elementary school student lost in an empty town, but will you be able to return home?

name: Unstable Blocks
summary: Warning! Highly addictive action puzzle game. Single or Multiplayer. Stack the blocks to the target height, but beware these blocks are unstable.

name: Under a Tree with Cherry Blossoms: Love with One's Back
summary:
Your story game, your love story, your own romance.
YOU decide what happens in each story.
Choose your story and let yourself be captivated by our immersive interactive series.

name: Unromantic Demon Queen
summary:
"I will regain my magic and become the Demon Queen!"

You, the heir to the Demon king, entered the human world and lost all your magical abilities.
You discover that you can restore your magical powers through intimate contact with three men you encounter by chance...

At the end of this adventure, will you be able to ascend to the throne as the Demon Queen?

name: UnderKingdom
summary: This is a top-down automatic shooting light ROGUE game. You will use various fruits to fight. Pick up the fruits to destroy the enemies!

name: Unou Kaihatsu Series 10 Nontan to Issho Wai-wai Nippon
Unicorn Senpai Slap
summary:
An arcade game where you slap unicorns in the future. #insanityjam

The game was made during four days for the Insanity Jam 2014.

name: Undernauts: Labyrinth of Yomi & Mon-Yu
summary: Undernauts: Labyrinth of Yomi & Mon-Yu Bundle

name: Universe Unknown
summary: A third person, sci-fi, looter shooter. Reclaim earth from robotic enemies. Level up, gain skill abilities, and fight for the right of our very existence.

name: Unbox the Room
summary: Unbox the Room is a relaxing puzzle game where you unpack and arrange items and furniture in your new home. Create a cozy space by placing everything just right, from the smallest cup to the largest sofa.

name: Under the Thorns
summary: Clara, a maid, arrives at a shrouded manor. Rumor has it that her new employer is dangerous and has dismissed thirteen maids before her. What secrets is he hiding? A captivating tale of mystery, suspense, and romance.

name: Undead Trail: Haunting Shadows
summary: Play as a lone survivor in a creepy mansion overrun by zombies. Fight, solve puzzles, and hide to stay alive. Created by a single developer, this passion project promises a top-tier horror experience.

name: Unity-chan the SharpShooter!
summary: A casual sports TPS that can be played using only the mouse! Let's try clay pigeon shooting, rifle shooting, and rail shooting with Unity-chan!

name: Unstoppable: Breakout
summary: Unstoppable: Breakout is an immersive horror adventure where strategy, resource management, and courage are necessary if you want to survive. Escape the tower … if you can.

name: Unbirth
summary: Unbirth is the first 3D game from Frictional Games.

name: Unheil
summary:
Unheil invites you to a thrilling adventure filled with suspense, where you attempt to unravel the mysteries while trying to find the murderer of a crime committed in a cursed mansion in "Unheilsdorf," a town in Northern Germany in 1930. The story begins when the case is assigned to Alexia after a traveling journalist is found dead in the mansion he was investigating.

You'll witness unprecedentedly chilling events as you try to uncover the dark secrets lurking within a cursed mansion alongside Alexia. This village has never returned any of its visitors. Will you be able to escape the clutches of this cursed village?

name: Under the Jolly Roger + Crossroads Inn: Bring Me That Horizon Bundle
summary:
Under The Jolly Roger
Trade, fight and explore on your own! Set your foot on the land to plunder it!

Crossroads Inn
Build and manage your tavern! Make visiting adventurers happy, and your services famous all over the land.

name: Undesired Harem: Harem Nanka Nozondenai!
summary:
A sudden harem situation?!
His heart must decide between 4 beautiful girls!

name: Undo The Jam Damage
summary: Bruce's love for PB&J sandwiches has entangled him in a spellbinding predicament. Venture into the enchanted forest to help Bruce lift the witch’s curse. Tread carefully, though—the woods are fraught with dangers for the unprepared.

name: Undercity
summary: Try yourself as the subway train driver. You should transport a lot of people according to a schedule. Your reward depends on this. The money can be used to improve the train or to transfer to another major city where you can already drive a new and powerful train. Enter the subway car quickly, do not drive past the stations and arrive right according to the schedule, when the timer is at 0. Not before and not later. Also watch out for vandals and terrorists!

name: Under The Concrete Wave
summary: Under The Concrete Wave is a 3rd-person cooperative platformer where you alone or with friends take control of robots who have decided to leave the pit of monstrous brutalism. Jump, fall, throw objects, throw friends, solve puzzles (or not) on your way up.

name: Unlighted
summary: You will play as a test subject that works for a company called Umbral Alchemy, dedicated to the research of stones with mysterious properties never seen before by humans. Thanks to you they hope to discover the origin of these strange materials, but it won't be an easy path.

name: Unkillable Robots
summary: UNKILLABLE ROBOTS is an exciting game set in the distant future, where robots have taken over the whole world and are divided into two camps. Some robots strive to restore order and peace, while others crave destruction and chaos.

name: Unholy Legacy
summary: Something evil has awoken, something ancient. An unholy force lurks in the shadows and the darkness of night. As fate would have it, you must now face this evil. To survive, you must fight, solve puzzles, and unravel the mystery of this ancient and unholy legacy.

name: Unyha
summary: Unyha is the first-ever autochronicle online RPG, where your adventures, victories, and defeats become real stories that influence the game for all, and forever. History content is generated by Unyha's unique Autochronicle AI, making it truly aware of players' activity—and naturally responds to it.

name: Undertale: Promised.
summary: Undertale Promised. A fight against Sans but pretty early on in the story.

name: Unplagued
summary: Play as plague doctors with your friends in this multiplayer co-op medieval horror! Purge the plague. Create the cure. Escape the mutated creatures. Make the queen proud.

name: Undertale Patience
summary:
Welcome to UNDERTALE PATIENCE. In this RPG Fan-Prequel UNDERTALE, you control the first human who falls underground in the world of monsters.

the fan-game was canceled unfortunately because the creator passed away, Rest in peace.

name: UniqKiller
summary: An upcoming multiplayer top-down shooter for mobile devices and PC.

name: Un-Matching Game
summary: I'll show you four words. Find the one that doesn't match.

name: Untitled Risk of Rain Fighting Game
Undertale Cyan
summary: Undertale Cyan is a Fangame Prequel RPG Based on the Game Undertale. It Follows The Human Child with the Patience Soul; Belle, Who Ended up In the Underground and Tries to Find Her Way Out.

name: Undertale Green
summary: Undertale Green is a fan game that tells the story of the fifth human, Cody

name: Undertale Green
summary: Undertale Green is a Fangame project where you follows the fifth human, Olive, the soul of kindness through their journey into the underground, in order to find the king of monsterkind. But will they makes friend on the road ? it's up to you to decide their fate, in brand new areas, and with brand new monsters to discover!

name: Untitled Instagram Easter Egg
summary: An untitled game which is an Easter egg found on Instagram's Direct Messages. By touching an emoji, a screen with a single Pong-style game opens up. The player is intended to use a paddle to prevent the ball (the emoji which was clicked on) to fall below the screen). Some emojis have different behavior, changing according to the amount of points scored.

name: Underground Fortress
summary: The sequel to West Alien Train.

name: Unreal Match 3
summary: Unreal Match 3 is a match 3 game that's built from the ground up to help developers learn how to make mobile games using Unreal Engine 4.

name: Unravel Trigger
summary:
The Frost Neutral Territory - a buffer zone between the superpowers of the Karg Federation and the Vilcar Empire. A tourist hotspot, yet a melting pot of constant conflict with its diverse immigrant populations.

Sakaki Kai, the protagonist, is an investigator at the Trigger Detective Agency based on this neutral ground. His mission? To track down his childhood friend Yuzuriha Saina, who vanished during the last great war.

While there have been scattered sightings of Saina in this area, her trail has gone cold.

Then, from a hilltop overlooking the city, Kai crosses paths with Millie - a young girl reaching up towards the sky. Much like Saina from years past, Millie laments the endless cycle of violence and yearns for peace. This meeting isn't just a big deal for Kai or the neutral district—it will shake things up for the whole world.

A tale of confronting lost pasts to stride towards a new future - the curtain rises here.

name: Uncover the Triad of Terror
summary:
Oh, did you ‘see’ it…?
Spot the Difference in Horror Illustrations

name: Under Night In-Birth II: Character - Uzuki
summary: This add-on unlocks the playable character Uzuki and allows immediate access to the character upon activation.

name: Under A Stone Blanket
summary: Small tomb / crypt brick map built within a 1024^3 volume, textured with Makkon and based on Progs_dump (included).

name: Unko Technica
summary: Enjoy the retro neon style graphics and cool sounds of this stylish UNKO action game as you guide the automatically running UNKO to the goal of the toilet by making it jump.

name: Underground Turtle Races
summary: Are you ready to test your luck in the secret world of turtle racing? The turtles are waiting for you to place your bets and cheer them on. Do you have the confidence to take on the challenge?

name: Unreal Wukong
summary: " Unreal WuKong" is an open-world action RPG based on the classic Chinese mythological novel, "Journey to the West." You will play as the Monkey King, Sun Wukong, embarking on a perilous and wondrous adventure to save the world by vanquishing demons that have traveled from the future.

name: Until Oblivion
summary: Until Oblivion is an atmospheric narrative game that follows 17 year old nobody Emma Wilson as she tries to rekindle a dying relationship in a dying world. Join her in an increasingly nightmarish Halloween party and find out if anything (or anyone) is worth anything at all.

name: Undead Inc.: Worky DLC
summary: Unlock a Director: Weaponized Worky. A customized version of Worky's Office Rentals' Robot Receptionist by the same name, Weaponized Worky has come to work really hard and punch stuff sometimes.

name: Undercover: Secret Management
summary: Help Veronica solve another dark mystery and reconcile with her sister.

name: Underground Prisoner
summary: Underground Prisoner is a necromancer's journey through a world of dangerous adventures in search of a precious soul herb that can summon and control the souls of the dead. Explore dark forests, abandoned cemeteries and dungeons, fight terrible monsters.

name: Uncharted World
summary: Uncharted World - In the role of an experienced and brave explorer, you set off on an exciting adventure through uncharted lands. Your task is to explore vast expanses, explore wild forests, explore mountain ranges and explore mysterious deserts.

name: Unveiling the Unknown
summary: Welcome to Balethorn Manor, where five maids are waiting to serve your every need and desire. By the day, talk to your maids, fall in love, and make love. By night, dive into an expansive dungeon system and collect untold riches to level your maids and upgrade the manor!

name: Untitled Goose Game & Thank Goodness You're Here! Bundle
summary:
Two passingly similar, yet very different games about causing hilarious chaos in small British towns.
Untitled Goose Game
It's a lovely morning in the village and you are a horrible goose.

Thank Goodness You're Here!
Thank Goodness You're Here! is an absurd comedy slapformer set in the bizarre Northern English town of Barnsworth. As a traveling salesman, take the time to see the sights and meet the locals, who are very eager to give you a series of increasingly odd jobs…

name: Undead Paradise
summary: First Person wave-based horde survival. Defeat endless hordes of enemies to reach higher scores!

name: UnLoop
summary:
UnLoop is a retro-futuristic VR puzzle game built around self-cooperative time loop mechanics. As a spy infiltrating a remote space station, you encounter a temporal phenomenon that creates copies of yourself each loop, replaying your past actions in real time. Learning to work with your past selves and use the loop to your advantage becomes the only way forward.

Your mission: solve puzzles, retrieve critical data from the station, and uncover the source of the time loop.

name: Unou no Tatsujin: Soukai! Machigai Museum 2
Unlikely
summary: A little dice game with a somewhat hungry clown.

name: Unbodied
summary: Unbodied, a small adventure in which you play a skeleton whose body has been stolen. Control your magic wand, solve all the puzzles and find all the spells to finish with the powerful wizard and thus, recover what is yours.

name: Undivine
summary: A dark metroidvania with RPG elements, "Undivine" challenges you to explore, battle, and uncover secrets in a desolate, interconnected world. Customize your abilities, wield unique weapons, and delve into deep lore filled with mystery.

name: Untold Story
summary: A classic 2D RPG in the style of Valiant and Aveyond, a tale about wealth, power and knowledge.

name: Unicopia
summary: Unicopia is a retro 2D platformer featuring a Unicorn racing to rescue her girlfriend from the clutches of an Evil Poodle. Jump up and down towers, collect gems, and reveal the key before the clock strikes and you're haunted by the ghost of time!

name: Unite the Party
summary: Unite The Party is a Online 3D Virtual Tabletop using Unreal Engine 5, offering Game Masters a Sandbox kit to run TTRPGs with distant players!

name: University Tycoon: The College Management Simulator
summary: Build and manage a University, with realistic curriculum scheduling, reputation system, and a multiple building campus

name: Untold Tales: A Scarlet Way
summary: Immerse yourself in the grim and brutal story of Little Red Riding Hood accompanied by heavy music in the genres of Metal and Dubstep, as you explore a dark fantasy world with Victorian-era architecture and technology

name: Under the Blue Horizon
summary: "Under the Blue Horizon" is an idle simulation game. Play while performing other tasks on your computer! Place your own aquarium anywhere on your screen, coexisting with your work, games, and more!

name: Undead At Dawn
summary: Undead at Dawn is a twin-stick shoot’em up with a 3D simil-isometric view using Tilt-Shift effect, in which the player has to survive to hordes of thousands of zombies, in order to rescue his friend and prevent a world invasion.

name: Uno
summary: A game of Uno made for in-flight entertainment systems.

name: Undergoes
summary: Undergoes is a stylized survival horror game where players navigate a drill ship through procedurally generated mines, gather resources, craft tools, and build bases while fending off dangerous enemies.

name: Untitled RPG from WolfEye Studios
summary: A first-person action RPG that's set in an alternate America in the 1900s. The game will be set near or in the Colorado area and conjure a "steampunk 1900s" aesthetic rather than pull from traditional Western tropes.

name: Underground Station
summary:
An adventure into the mysterious world of the underground Labour Office begins.
Here, money decides everything.

name: Undertale Wildfire
summary: Undertale Wildfire is a fan-made prequel to Toby Fox’s Undertale, centered around the second fallen human: the soul of bravery.

name: Untameable
summary: Untameable (also referred to as "Untameable, Book 1") is the first book of the Untameable series. It is followed by Unbridled: An Untameable Story.

name: Unbridled: An Untameable Story
summary: Unbridled: An Untameable Story is the second and final book of the Untameable series. It succeeds its first book, Untameable.

name: UnderDark
summary:
Tower Defense: Guarding the Flame from the Darkness!
Defend the Flame from the dark! Level up, strategically place towers, and choose buffs to grow stronger. Keep the light alive!
Defend the Eternal Flame: Experience the thrill of defending the flame from hordes of dark forces that besiege it! Feel the exhilaration as you clear stages, with each victory more satisfying than the last.
One-Handed Gameplay: Enjoy easy-to-master controls, designed for one-handed play. Perfect for strategic fun anytime, anywhere.
Customize Your Defense Strategy: Select buffs and strategically place towers to forge your path of resistance. As you level up and choose your growth buffs, your defense becomes an impenetrable fortress.
Heroic Stand: Choose your guardians to stand against the night. Each hero brings unique abilities to the battlefield. Earn trophies, level up, and enhance your heroes to ensure the flame flickers on through the darkest nights!

name: Undertale: Wildfire
summary:
Undertale Wildfire is a fangame and prequel to the RPG Undertale. In this game you play as the second human - the Bravery SOUL - who fell to the Underground. Riley has spent roughly a month living among the Monsters of Snowdown, when one day a fateful encounter forces them to step out of the comfort of the small life they've built and begin a journey to New Home.

Using various trinkets, PLAYs, and your wits, you'll embark on a journey and confront monsters and puzzles along the way, and choose how you'll advance through the Underground. How will your Bravery manifest?

name: Una noche sin nombre
summary: This is a world where witches and demons dwell on the fringes of reality. Charles finds himself in the rain, seeking shelter when he encounters a woman in the forest who asks him for a favor—to search for something very precious to her. At that moment, Charles finds a house and ventures inside, where he encounters a mysterious girl.

name: Unicycle Pizza Time!
summary: Unicycle Pizza Time! is a rage inducing platformer where you navigate a dense cityscape without falling over.

name: Underground
summary:
Utsumi Natsumu, whose father is a professional baseball player, has absolute confidence and pride in his baseball ability.
But when in high school he meets Fuyuki Nagito, a true genius, Natsumu's life goes awry.

A dark coming-of-age BL story woven by two people who should never have met.

name: Unless
summary: Take a trip back to the nostalgic era of platforming games built without gimmicks or a story. Race through bite-sized levels solo, or with a co-op helper to get the best time among your friends, or maybe even the world!

name: Undergrounded
summary: “Undergrounded” is a puzzle adventure where you explore a dungeon formed by the accumulation of American history. Become Scott, who wandered underground in search of his lost engagement ring after failing to propose to his girlfriend, and plumb the depths of the past itself with your buddy Canary!

name: Undertale Yellow: Dual
summary: Ever thought "Damn they did ma boy starlo dirty in the genocide route", yeah a lot of people did. well now we finally have a fight against him on this route in this fangame.

name: Unlich
summary: Unlich is a pixel art dark fantasy monster-taming RPG with grid battles, focused on exploration and customization.

name: UNO: Legacy Edition
summary: Dive into the world of UNO with the Legacy Edition bundle, featuring the classic card game alongside three exciting DLCs: UNO Flip!, UNO 50th Anniversary, and UNO Party! Mania. Inspired by Mattel's iconic physical games, each DLC adds a unique twist on the beloved gameplay experience, ensuring endless hours of fun!

name: Unstackable
summary:
When the worst property developer decides to invest on a remote and inaccessible island, you and your tugboat are the only ones who can help and build the most charming housing project.

Pick up the buildings and send them flying on the island so that people can start moving in right away (or not)...

name: Uncover
summary: Uncover is an online fast-paced clue alternative card game

name: Untitled Experimental Platformer by KG
summary: A 2D platformer where you'll be able to explore an open world, use different double jump types to tackle different levels, and be able to make your own route through the game.

name: Undesired Catch
summary: Drive your boat through a desolate post-apocalyptic landscape and try to find all the pots to return home. Something is waiting for you hidden under the water.

name: UnNecessary
summary: UnNecessary is a Doom II megawad created by scwiba, and a sequel of his Doom 1 three-episode WAD UnAligned. Much like its predecessor, UnNecessary features short, compact but experimental maps with sometimes unorthodox gameplay, and was built over the course of 30 days.

name: Unoriginal Space Shooter
summary:
This Sonic Mania mod aims to be a mod that doesn't play nor feel like Mania at all, hence the old PC-Monochrome-like style used for the whole game.
You simply shoot things that comes at random and aim for the best score you can do !

name: Unfair Rampage: Knightfall
summary: Fast-paced 2.5D platformer! Blast through a destructible medieval world. You've been sent back in time to correct a twisted space-time continuum - battle knights and archers, dodge hazards, carve your path, and race against the crumbling world behind you. Easy to learn - hard to master!

name: Unrooted
summary: You were sent in a problematic area to soothe the earth, using rudimentary equipment you are tasked with destroying the machines hurting the environment and help the area by putting down fire, get rid of pollution and soothing the trees.

name: Undertale: Act to Flirt
summary: A new human has fallen to the underground two weeks after the events caused by Frisk, who mysteriously disappeared after being last seen in New Home. A lot has happened in these past two weeks... aside from monsters figuring out how to get to the Surface.

name: Unto Deepest Depths
summary: A dark fantasy strategy game where you must build a party and lead them into the unknown to vanquish the horrors below. Battle through turn-based combat, upgrade your units, and plan your moves carefully in this punishing roguelite where any move could be your last.

name: Untangle Goats
summary: Untangle Goats is a 2D puzzle game based on the action of drag and dropping milk baby bottles. It is set on a farm with a lot a hungry baby goats. You will have to find out the right combinations of various playful patterns, composed of letters, numbers and symbols on those labelled baby bottles, in order to feed all of the baby goats on the farm.

name: Undertale Yellow But Blue
summary:
This game takes place in an AU in which Clover and Flo (An OC of the Integrity Soul) switch places. Go through all of Undertale Yellow with a twist.
That being using the blue soul mode throughout all battles.
Several pieces of dialogue and even some cutscenes have been changed.

name: Universe of Trials
summary: Universe of Trials is a multiplayer climbing game with fun modes. Race to the top, dodge hazards in "Floor is Lava," survive in "Falling Floor," or outlast everyone in "Last to Leave." Compete, climb, and conquer the leaderboards!

name: Under Your Moon
summary:
You're entirely alone-- until you're not. Entirely out of place, entirely by surprise, a mysterious person appears in your apartment. The first person that you've seen in years-- and then they're gone again, just as quickly. It's undeniable that something is changing, and that is has to with this stranger--
And something tells you that you'll see them again.

name: Unicycle Giraffe
summary: Unicycle Giraffe is a balancing game about giraffes, fancy hats & making new friends. Jump on a unicycle and earn yourself some coin to pay back your debts in this cute and colourful physics wobbler.

name: UnHumanize
summary: Can technology help humans achieve their dreams, or is fighting fate a big gamble for humanity?

name: Uncle Chuck Incorporated
summary: In 2005, the robotics entertainment company Uncle Chuck Inc. mysteriously declared bankruptcy. As an investigator, your mission is to infiltrate their abandoned headquarters, solve puzzles, and find a hidden VHS tape revealing the truth, all while evading the dangerous animatronic characters.

name: Unctrl
summary:
UNCTRL is a fast-paced one-button game.

Your goal is to launch guided missiles and hit enemies and their projectiles. The enemies come from the right and constantly shoot. Press a button to fire a missile. The missile will always go down on its own and you can make it go up by holding a button.

The game is over when an enemy projectile hits you.

name: Un:logical
summary:
Participation in the VR game "Un:logical" is by invitation only.

You are welcomed to this virtual world, where one's senses of touch, taste, and pain are real, by the adorable "Apprentice Angel".

Those who participate will later find themselves threatened by the "side effects" caused by the game...

name: Uno Wonder
summary: Set sail on a luxurious global cruise, travel the world, visit iconic landmarks, and make new friends along the way.

name: Under The Blue Horizon: Aquarium
summary: "Under the blue horizon - Aquarium" is a game for those who want to enjoy watching fish. Observe fish in the sea and in aquariums. Discover more types of special fish. Enjoy it while working, relax, or clear your mind.

name: Under Defeat
summary:
Set in an alternative history where all-out war has erupted, development of this new release falls into the capable hands of City Connection, under supervision by Takehiro Eda and Zerodiv Fukushima Factory, well known in the shooter community for their high-quality ports of classic games.

A popular arcade shooter from G.rev, Under Defeat originally released in 2005 and attracted a legion of fans thanks to its high-octane gameplay, as one or two players assume control of a heavily armed helicopter, taking on a non-stop assault of fighters, played across a semi-isometric playfield, with the unique ability to tilt shots left or right when attacking your enemy. Renowned for its explosive 3D graphics and high intensity gameplay, Under Defeat features no less than three game modes offering high levels of replayability, all of which have been integrated under supervision of G.rev.

Arcade Mode faithfully replicates the original arcade experience, with a 4:3 ratio and a pseudo vertical screen. New Order Mode adapts the game for modern displays, transforming the adrenaline packed shooting action to widescreen 16:9 ratio, and New Order Mode+ brings a host of additional elements to the game, not least being a “WARNING GAUGE,” which adds a risk/reward mechanic to assist the player as they shoot, bomb and swerve through the hordes of enemy invaders.

In addition, Under Defeat comes complete with an incredible soundtrack, newly boosted by video game music veteran, Shinji Hosoe (Ridge Racer series, Tekken series, etc.) and his company, Super Sweep.

name: Undercover
summary: In Undercover, you enter a medieval world as a noble knight among trusted comrades. But beware—one of you is an infiltrator with a deadly mission. While you carry out your knightly duties, deception and danger lurk in the shadows. Can you unmask the traitor before they strike?

name: Unterholz
summary: Explore the murky corners and abandoned ruins of an isolated enclave in 15th century Europe. Prevail in chivalrous battle and unveil the mysteries of a dark world. Embark on a non-linear psychological journey through the underbrush of this sinister setting as well as your own soul.

name: Undertale: Bits and Pieces Together
summary: Undertale: Bits and Pieces Together is a mod that allows you to play the entire original Undertale Bits and pieces mod but with two players!

name: Undead Vendetta
summary: Step into the shadowy world of Rosewood City, where your ordinary life as a waitress is about to morph into a tantalizing quest to break an ancient curse.

name: Unplugged
summary: Embark on an adventure with a friend in UnPlugged. Work together with a friend in a challenging Local Co-Op as two robots who work their way through challenging puzzles and mazes in an epic adventure.

name: Undying: The Beast
summary: Your town calls you a witch, but you're a simple, widowed herbalist. Tonight is your first brush with the supernatural. A man is hunted and finds refuge in your home, and you can tell he's something other than human.

name: Undying: Reject
summary: A short visual novel in which a vampire offers his help

name: Unpacking Universe Dreams
summary: Unpack, Arrange, Create - Shape your world

name: Uncle Unco
summary: One Fluffy Ball, One Late Bus! A Hyper-Cozy game by @Jonniemadeit

name: UnBorn
summary: You are trapped in a graveyard. Unlike the zombies that are out to eat your brains. You can't stay awake forever. Your gonna need to kill zombies for adrenaline. But zombies can't die. So your gonna need as much ammo and guns as you can find. Lucky for you the graveyard can supply you.

name: Uncanny Cat Golf
summary: Uncanny Cat Golf is, at its core, a simple golf game; using your mouse, you hit the CANNY CAT and you try to get it to the goal in as few hits as possible. Look out for the UNCANNY CATS, however - they will constantly pursuit and will not stop until they catch you!

name: Unwilting
summary: Explore the unwilting gardens in this relaxing first person gardening adventure game!

name: Undertide
summary: You arrive by boat at a blinking tower, a body washes up in town. Talk to townsfolk and explore in this dreamlike mystery.

name: UniqKiller: Urban Shooter
summary: UniqKiller is an intense F2P topdown third-person shooter, PvP, with automatic shooting. Combine different types of bodies, classes, skills, weapons, skins, to create unique heroes (UNIQS), both in appearance and gameplay, for battles in urban environments.

name: Unprotected
summary: A perverted scientist wants to immortalize the human race and reduce the total human population. While trying to uncover this secret in the game, force the scientist to correct his mistakes!

name: Unnamed Hero in the Underworld
summary: Unnamed Hero in the Underworld is a 3D horror game with EGA graphics. Hades, the god of the dead and the king of the underworld, is going mad. Monsters rise from the grave. The dark forces of the underworld are everywhere... Unnamed hero, please, save Greece!

name: Uno: Party! Mania
summary: Dive into the classic game with a twist, as extra action cards and special rules have been added to spice things up!

name: Underwater Abyss
summary: This game immerses you in a lush green forest where sunlight filters through the canopy

name: Unexpected Pigeon Race
summary: A pigeon racing game (Checkpoint system) the race passes through ancient Egyptian historical sites (Abu Simbel, Philae, Edfu, Luxor, Karnak, Hatshepsut, Dendera, Abydos and Pyramids).

name: Unpunished
summary: UNPUNISHED game is a horror story game that is endowed with good, realistic graphics and plot

name: Unlight: Revive
summary:
This is a story-centered competitive training card game. Players explore and conquer quest mode (single player) with character cards to obtain treasure chests, train and customize their character cards, and explore deck construction that suits their strategy, such as focusing on preemptive action, attack, defense, or overall balance. Not only do trained character cards increase their HP and attack/defense stats, but they also learn special moves unique to each character, which, when conditions are right, can deal significant damage and battle effects to enemies.

Deck construction is also a crucial factor when battling other players in Duel Mode (PvP), so build your deck carefully yet boldly.

name: Undercook
summary: A single-battle Undertale fan game, featuring Archo the dino chef.

name: Untravelled Planet
summary: Outer space 3D-platformer action.

name: Untitled Virtua Fighter Game
summary:
We're excited to unveil a special preview of the concept video for the "New VIRTUA FIGHTER Project." This video was presented at the Consumer Electronics Show, the world's largest electronics trade fair, during the keynote speech by NVIDIA's founder and CEO, Jensen Huang.

Please note that this is a concept video created before development began. The actual gameplay and characters may differ from what is shown.

name: Undisputed: Deluxe WBC Edition
summary: Become Undisputed and rule the ring in the most authentic boxing game to date! Featuring true to life visuals, bone-jarring action, and more licensed boxers than ever before, Undisputed gives you unprecedented control to master every inch of the ring.

name: Unhidden: Cozy Hidden Object
summary: Immerse Yourself in Tranquil Scenes: Explore beautifully crafted locations—from quaint cottages to peaceful gardens—each brought to life with intricate details, enchanting animations, and soothing soundscapes.

name: Unforgivable?
summary: Unforgivable? is a narrative driven game where you are thrown into a mediating role, having but 5 days to convince a group of terrorists who claim to be animals taken human form to free their captive humans. Playing as Sheep, you speak with the terrorists. Your approach will determine the fate of everyone involved.

name: Unearther
summary: Journey into different places and environments in search of resources and valuables. Make tools and equipments, survive the dangers and lurking monsters. Craft your way of living and discover the unknown world hidden in plain sight.

name: Unemployment Simulator
summary: Navigate the challenges of life without a job in Unemployment Simulator, a first-person survival experience where you manage your day-to-day needs, search for work, and try to stay afloat. Balance basic needs like food, hygiene, and sanity while facing the harsh realities of unemployment.

name: Unemployment Simulator 2018
summary: A social welfare survival horror based on real events. Endure emotional pain, crushing pressure of adulthood and societal expectations while evading a literal death by boredom. Battle demons, hide from skeletons, keep your bathroom clean. Uncover a dark mystery and emerge as a hero.

name: Unwanted Xmas Gift Burning Simulator
summary: Under Santa's watchful eye, burn wood logs, wrapped gifts, or a random mix from the elves' workshop. Enjoy the mesmerizing fire as your pile of gifts turns to ashes. Just sit back, relax, and let the magic of the flames warm you. Happy burning!

name: Uncle Chop's Rocket Shop: Deluxe Edition
summary:
Collect everything Uncle Chop's Rocket Shop has to offer in this convenient (if we don't say so ourselves) bundle. It contains the following:
• Base Game
• Soundtrack
• Deluxe Skin and Artbook

name: Underground Mission
summary: Underground Mission is an unlicensed shooter puzzle game published by Power Joy Ltd.. The objective of the game is to collect all the items dispersed around the stages and rescue a kidnapped soldier.

name: Under Your Spell
summary: "Under Your Spell" is an immersive text-based magic school and dating simulator, drawing inspiration from beloved games like True Love 95 and Persona 4. As the protagonist, you'll juggle the challenges of school life while navigating the complexities of romance and participating in the highly anticipated "Cup of Cathal"

name: Undead Realm: Ego
summary: Time stands still, space warps, whispers in the dark and indescribable things are approaching you step by step. You will embark on a survival journey with several strangers in a desolate and mysterious place, and immerse yourself in a horrible battle royale full of despair from the first perspective

name: Unaccessible
summary: Unaccessible is a third-person wheelchair platformer about struggling to get a health insurance claim approved on a mysterious island without accessibility ramps. Tackle stairs, climb obstacles and hop your way through the pain of the claims approval process.

name: Undertale: Repent to Jesus
summary: Christian mod with bible verses. Tells the true meaning of Christmas. Converts the game into a God-honoring adventure with the gospel. Revamps some of the story. Changes some sprites. Has two main endings - requires a second playthrough for the second ending (has sort of secret...? requirements to unlock). Most graphical changes are in the second playthrough. Interaction with objects and NPCS instead of rushing through the game is recommended.

name: Union Arena Tutorial App
summary:
Let’s learn how to play UNION ARENA!
A tutorial app that lets you experience the brand-new trading card game " UNION ARENA" is now available!

name: Unseen
summary: Anomaly finding game that takes place in an old apartament building

name: Unplayable
summary: UNPLAYABLE is a funny/artsy compilation of absurd video games, each in a specific genre: beat'em up, puzzle game and platformer. An art project with meaning.

name: Unbothered
summary:
Drink beer
Smoke cigarettes
Spit on the ground

name: Undying Flower
summary: Would you forgive yourself if you killed someone you love? Enter the traumatic memories of The Flower, experience death as the killer and the killed, and submerge yourself in a dark, interactive adventure of emotions, suffering, and regret - looking for a way to forget.

name: Uncursed
summary:
Uncursed is a co-op pirate adventure where you rescue lost souls, loot shiny treasures, items and uncover secrets so dark even your torch might quit. Survive deadly dungeons, face unpredictable weather, and the occasional chaos caused by your crewmates—all while gathering loot to buy a ship, buy cool gear, and maybe splurge on a new hat.

Your crew's goal is to buy and repair a ship to reach more distant waters and shed light on the threatening secret.

Explore the surrounding islands alone or in a team, collect valuable items and the souls attached to them. Every day you can take part in a new adventure in the procedurally generated dungeon, which rewards you with valuable treasures if you survive its terrifying creatures and cunning traps.

name: Underward
summary: UNDERWARD is a 1-4 player co-op horror exploration game. Investigators must carry «TEST-SUBJECT» monsters from a deadly underground abandoned hospital ward.

name: Undertale: Call of the Void - Placek's Take
summary: Undertale: Call of the Void [Placek's Take] is an alternate interpretation of Undertale: Call of the Void, originally created by Saster and J-Bug. Developed by Placek and the COTW Team, this version introduces multiple unique endings, enhanced graphics, and fresh twists while preserving the signature Call of the Void style.

name: Undertale Green: The Pre-Show
summary: Experience a one-shot adventure setting up the vibrant characters of Undertale Green through a drab snippet of the surface! Interact with an unorthodox battle system, make new friends, and prepare for the long road ahead.

name: Undertale Plus
summary: Undertale Plus is a mod that allows you to have your own completely customized Undertale experience! Bringing all-console exclusive content of the original, with widescreen support, colored sprites, custom battle backgrounds, bug fixes, and many more with add-ons.

name: Underswap: Echoed
summary: “Underswap: Echoed” is the Breakfast Bunch’s reimagining of the popular Undertale AU, Underswap.

name: Undertale Together: Next Soul
summary: A mod of Undertale where you can play with two characters!

name: Underswap: The Reckoning
summary: Out of all the possible paths you can possibly entwine yourself into, this one in particular will prove to really challenge your palette.

name: UnderTale: DoctorTale
summary:
DoctorTale is a crossover fan-game based on the sci-fi series Doctor Who (by BBC) and the RPG game UnderTale (by Toby Fox).

The plot tells of the Time Lord from Gallifrey, traveling across different planets that are imprisoned in one large Pocket Universe which is on the verge of self-destruction. In this world, you can go the way of mercy to save everyone, or you can use brute force to achieve personal freedom. You decide, the fate of the universe is in your hands.

name: Undertinge
summary: Play as the Wizard named Frisk. Welding magic as a weapon, you have to end the Eternal Night, destroying the heart of darkness that plagues the land, freeing the world from the wicked clutches of the ancient curse. Will you let the darkness blind you? Will you make it out alive? Well, that, my friend, is up to you to decide.

name: Unmourned
summary: Unmourned is a first person psychological horror game where you play as Jason, a man who moves into a new house only to be haunted by escalating paranormal activities. As the disturbances grow more intense, Jason discovers that the house's previous owners mysteriously vanished. Driven by terror and desperation, Jason must uncover the truth behind the family’s disappearance and find a way to break the curse that now haunts him. Can he solve the mystery before it's too late?

name: Una ad Astra
summary: Una ad Astra is a turn-based tactical fantasy RPG, where you get to play not one, but two heroes. Mix and match skills from 7 different classes to defeat sneaky goblins and mighty dragons.

name: Under the Sea: A Hidden World of Wonders
summary: On a vibrant underwater reef, three very different friends embark on an extraordinary adventure. Learn their story in this beautiful visual novel.

name: Undertale: Thanatos!
summary:
MT EBOTT. 202X
Legends say that those who climb the mountain never return.
You, as the new fallen human, possess the power to manipulate the world.
But your actions have shown such power can easily corrupt your mind.
Your own curiosity, resulted in a mass extinction. Repeating the same events over and over again.
But nothing is meant to last forever.
Your very own power has consumed you. And now consequences of your actions are finally crawling up your back.

Are you ready?

name: Unizone's Underswap: Distrust Sans
summary: A take on the events of the Swap version of the famous "Disbelief Papyrus" Alternative Timeline

name: Unfamiliar Lands
summary: A story-driven, exploration-centric, fantasy adventure game with timed action boss fights filled with magic, mystery and puzzles.

name: Unlucky Chicken
summary: An unlucky chicken fell to the bottom of a ravine and was injured. It can no longer fly smoothly, but now it just wants to go home and hopes you can help it.

name: Unblinking
summary: Trapped on death row, unravel the dark mystery of an ancient horror to escape alive. Outsmart the abyss, cheat death - if you dare.

name: UnControlled Shooter
summary:
A Short Shoot 'em up about defeating the aliens with your uncontrollable space ship.

A Small game made in 72 hours for the Mini Jam 74: Chaos, with the limitation of only using the A, X, B, P, 8 button and the Space bar.

name: Undertale: Papyrus' Belief
summary: A take on the Disbelief project owned by FlamesAtGames where the roles of Sans and Papyrus are reversed in the no mercy route!

name: Undercraft
summary: Undercraft is a turn-based, roguelike auto-battle card game where you'll have the option to choose between game levels, participate in single-player free-for-all or one-on-one multiplayer battles, unlock characters, explore classes, explore history, view new seasons, and more.

name: Unfriendly Friend
summary: From YOUR decisions, many people could get hurt. Can you save your friends or at least save yourself from the horror that awaits?

name: Undertale: Hard Mode - Wonderful Idea [Genocide Ending]
summary: In Wonderful Idea, the personalities of certain characters are amplified. For example, Toriel is more protective, Undyne is more determined and Papyrus even ends up joining the Royal Guard.

name: Unknown 9: Awakening - Deluxe Edition
summary: You are Haroona, a Quaestor born with the ability to venture into a mysterious dimension that overlaps our own, known only as the Fold. On her quest for powerful hidden knowledge, Haroona will learn to master her unique connection to the Fold, which allows her to channel its powers into our world... But such power does not go unnoticed and Haroona quickly becomes the target of a splinter faction calling themselves the Ascendants, who want to use the Fold to alter the course of human history.

name: Undertale: The Otherground
summary: In this new part of Undertale's world, take control of the new protagonist Louis as he searches to learn the fate or whereabouts of someone he held dear. Alongside this, cave-dweller twin humans "Sunny" and Renée will be joining Louis on this journey.

name: Uncursed
summary: Uncursed is a first-person psychological horror game blending immersive storytelling, environmental exploration, and puzzle-solving. Navigate a house filled with unsettling secrets, uncover the dark past hidden beneath its walls, and escape before history repeats itself.

name: Undisputed: The Problem Child Pack
summary: Undisputed brings you The Problem Child Pack, featuring Jake ‘El Gallo De Dorado' Paul, as well as six other epic fighters including Zhilei Zhang, Juan Manuel Márquez, Erik Morales, Marco Antonio Barrera, James ‘Buster' Douglas, and Otto Wallin, along with six new sets of ring attire for the current roster.

name: Unidentified Feline Obliterators
summary: Unidentified Feline Obliterators is a multiplayer arcade space shooter where you play as cats shooting deadly balls of matter in space! Their natural predators are the jetpack dogs, treadmill porcupines, and rocket rats. But what else is out there in space out to get these cats?

name: Undercover Fools
summary: Infiltrate a secure building, cleverly bypass guards and traps, complete tasks with the help of cool spy gadgets. Play alone or with friends, upgrade your spy skills and plan excellent missions, and most importantly... Don't screw up!

name: Unpatterned Cut
summary: Unpatterned Cut is a VR action-reflex game where you have to finish the episodes by killing enemies to survive in the simulation and maybe save your loved ones. Also, push yourself on scores and climb the leaderboard rankings against other players.

name: UnderRail 2: Infusion
summary: An immersive isometric turn-based RPG where you assume the role of a scavenger. Wandering through the ruins of a fallen civilization, scavengers make their living scouring a vast system of metro station-states called Underrail for technology and resources.

name: Unleashed Recompiled
summary: Unleashed Recompiled is an unofficial PC port of the Xbox 360 version of Sonic Unleashed created through the process of static recompilation. The port offers Windows and Linux support with numerous built-in enhancements such as high resolutions, ultrawide support, high frame rates, improved performance and modding.

name: Unboxing: Cozy Home Simulator
summary: Unwrap the comfort of your dream home!

name: United Assault: Final Stand
summary: United Assault - Final Stand is an open-world rogue-lite FPS set in 1945 Germany. Infiltrate the Führer's mountain residence, explore secret-filled bunkers, and engage in intense combat.

name: Under Par Golf Architect
summary: Step into the shoes of a golf architect as you build and manage your own golfing paradise! Sharpen your strategy by designing incredible courses to challenge the most demanding golfers and watch your club flourish as you attract VIP players, hire quirky staff and hold prestigious tournaments.

name: Unknot!
summary: Unknot! is a puzzle game with simple controls and realistic rope physics, immersing you in knot theory. It perfectly balances challenge and relaxation, offering a satisfying mental workout. Blending art, puzzles, and math, it’s a unique experience. Ready to unwind and think? Unknot! is here for you.

name: Universe Horizon
summary: An idle incremental game where you decide to travel across the whole Universe. Embark on this journey in your little ship and get as far away as possible from Earth, gathering resources and upgrading your spaceship along the way.

name: Unleashed
summary: Infinite runner where you play as a dog getting chased by its owner. The further you get without getting caught, and the more bones you collect along the way, the higher your score. As simple as that.

name: Unblock
summary:
Unblock is a little pseudo-isometric platformer about resilience and the power of never giving up.

Jump your way through colorful, handcrafted worlds that are as cute as they are challenging, and help Devon as he escapes the cubic realm to reclaim his ordinary life.

name: Underfell Neutral Run
summary: A fan game based on the Undertale AU "Underfell".

name: Unchained
summary: Unchained is a psychological horror game where you explore an abandoned virtual desktop hiding a terrible secret. The deeper you look into this 2D and 3D experience, the more secrets you'll uncover about the projects that were left behind by the previous owner.

name: Unusual Farm Operations
summary: You are an alien in a UFO, and you are tasked with abducting farm animals and collecting their samples.

name: Undertale: Remembering the Genocides
summary: Undertale: Remembering the GENOCIDES is an Undertale (joke) fangame (and yet another generic sans fangame) that took place of 69,000 genocide routes. Sans remembers you're genocides and decided to stop you early at Snowdin. Fight him to WIN.

name: U.N.P.O.C. Vessel of Opportunity
summary: Opportunity is near. Follow clues, solve the puzzles, and stay persistent in the chase of a new way of life. Explore, survive, and thrive in this open world adventure story.

name: UNB
summary:
Uh oh! Your tryin to HANG OUT WITH YOUR FRIEND ALIEN, but HIS UGLY and STUPID CYC is trying to KILL you! He's an STICKFIGUTRE, the only way to get to his GLASSES? The power of FL STUDIO...

PRESENTED BY THE RIZZ RESIDENCE CREW

name: Unravel Trigger: Prelude to War
summary:
An append to Unravel Trigger, with 3 new stories taking place before and after the war for Millicent, Natore and Estelle.
The after-war episode also serves as a prequel to Unravel Trigger: Cold War.

name: Unravel Trigger: Cold War
summary: The sequel to Unravel Trigger: Prelude to War.

name: Under Ichigo Love me baby!!! in Tokyo Super Arena 2025
