summary: A rhythm action game based on the viral idol trio "Under Ichigo" is here! Experience their first arena concert at one of Japan’s largest venues, "Tokyo Super Arena," recreated in real-time 3D. Enjoy professionally motion-captured dances and an intuitive, beginner-friendly rhythm game.

name: Unblock Now
summary: Move wooden blocks around the board in as few moves as possible to allow the red block to be slid off the board. Puzzle fun for the whole family!

name: Underworld Explorers
summary: Journey into the unknown with Underworld Explorers, a bite-sized roguelike with card and dice mechanics where you will fight powerful monsters, level up your heroes, find artifacts and explore deeper until you confront the Underworld Lord!

name: Unhuman Nightmare
summary: Unhuman Nightmare is a 4 player online co-op game where a team of thieves want to steal items from haunted places. What they don't know is that the places are full of traps set by ghosts. Chances are, they'll not escape alive...

name: Universe Dawn
summary:
Welcome to Universe Dawn, an exhilarating 4x strategy game where you can become the ultimate ruler of the cosmos! In this vast and immersive universe, you'll engage in epic battles, forge alliances, and compete for precious resources. Your journey begins with a single fleet, but as you navigate the stars, you'll upgrade your ships, expand your territory, and face off against other ambitious rulers.

Universe Dawn offers a unique blend of strategy and adventure, allowing you to shape your own destiny. Whether you choose to conquer through force or diplomacy, the universe is yours to command. Join the fight, upgrade your fleet, and become the greatest ruler the universe has ever known!

name: Unbox The Cats
summary: Find and rescue adorable cats hidden among boxes. Feed them treats to add them to your collection. Discover 100 unique cats in this casual puzzle game inspired by Minesweeper.

name: Unwelcome Guest
summary: You find yourself in a house that the owners have long since abandoned. But something lurks in the shadows, watching your every move. Explore the rooms, solve the mysteries, and find a way to banish the evil... Before it gets to you.

name: Universe Rhythm Shooting
summary: Universe Rhythm Shooting combines rhythm mechanics with virtual reality shooting as players pilot their spacecraft through space. Players match their shots and movements to the beat while navigating through cosmic environments, merging traditional rail shooter gameplay with musical elements.

name: Unstable Star
summary: Journey through Proximus-3 as Jaughn (pronounced “John”), and embark on a lighthearted and action-packed journey of redemption, quickly becoming embroiled in an unexpected Rebellion to save the galaxy.

name: Unsolved Case: Ash and Secrets - Collector's Edition
summary: Follow the trail of a mysterious amulet, expose deep-rooted corruption, and confront powerful adversaries who will stop at nothing to protect their secrets!

name: Unnamed Arcade
summary: The game is a creative 3rd person shooter / platformer, where players can earn rewards by completing challenges, or craft their own in game rewards by creating challenges for other players.

name: Unlock Me
summary: Unlock Me is a hyper casual puzzle mini game that you have to solve the 6 digit password by rotating the safe lock and hearing the sounds. Happy "Unlocking".

name: Unicorn Wars
summary: The Magic Forest is in danger. In the midst of an ancient conflict, the brothers Azulín and Gordi, together with an inexperienced group of recruits, embark on a mission to save their home. Honour, pain and cuddles!

name: Unfinished 2
summary: Unfinished 2 continues the story begun with Unfinished.

name: Undead Exile
summary: A first-person action RPG where you play as a mercenary in a post-apocalyptic world, fighting zombies and monsters. Collect points to upgrade your character, modify weapons, and stack stats like damage, crits, and accuracy. Intense combat with diverse gameplay and rich combinations.

name: Undead Cave Defence
summary: Undead army fills the world, and we are trapped in the cave of an ancient god. Roguelike strategic defense! Use your resources wisely, lead your soldiers, and unite the survivors. Ultimately, turn your cave into a fortress capable of defeating the undead king. The fate of the world is in your hands.

name: Unbound Eternity
summary: Unbound Eternity is a turn-based roguelite deck-building game where you play as the villain, not the hero. Build your domain, forge powerful cards, and seize every opportunity to establish your reign over the world!

name: Until You Return to the Earth
summary: A short freeware indie visual novel released in 2023. Reading time can range from half an hour to 2 hours, depending on reading speed. The game includes multiple choices.

name: Unique Ladies
summary: Love, fine food, and romance await! Join Laura Renaldi, a charming sales manager, on a whirlwind trip to an exclusive hospitality conference in Stockholm. Amidst galas and business deals, she’ll meet stunning women—will one be her true love? A heartwarming Yuri VN with humour, jazz, and romance!

name: Univocity
summary: Univocity is a short cyberpunk visual novel wrapped in neon aesthetics with a lush atmospheric soundtrack, featuring a deep and emotional conversation between two people about taking down a global tech monopoly.

name: Uncanny Tales: Cold Road
summary: Uncanny Tales is an episodic horror series where the real terror comes not from monsters or the supernatural, but from people. Each episode is a new unsettling story inspired by real fears and eerie situations from everyday life.

name: Uncharted Waters
summary:
The SNES Port of "Uncharted Waters". (also known as Super Daikoukai Jidai in Japan)

Climb aboard your flagship and set sail! As a young Portuguese captain, you are in search of fortune and fame. With your first mate at the helm, navigate the way to distant lands and legendary riches.

Port ho! Cast anchor in a new land and barter with stubborn merchants for exotic-spices and gems. Use profits to improve your fleet or face the dangers of the sea - pirates, storms and the mysteries of the deep. Win allies for Portugal, and the King will reward you grandly!

name: Unforgivable
summary: Rebecca's search for her missing girlfriend, Leanna, takes her to the Hemisfair Health Clinic, where nothing is as it seems. Uncover secrets, face gripping encounters, and unravel a chilling mystery in this story-focused third-person experience.

name: Unnatural Beauties
summary:
In Unnatural Beauties, you will have to capture animals, splice them together, and enter them into beauty pageants.

You start the game in your garden, this is where a variety of creatures live. Using only your cardboard box and fishing gnome, it's time to catch as many animals as you can.

When you are done hunting, head to your lab; this is where you will create your pageant contender. Using the animals you captured, pick the best parts of each creature and combine them to form a potential winner.

Now it's time to enter a contender into a pageant. Pageants take the form of mini games which test your contender's different qualities; looks, smarts, strength, and swimming ability. Each body part of your contender has different stats across these areas, tailoring your creation to the different pageants will make the mini games easier.

Placing in the top three will unlock the next pageant and give you a cash reward. Cash can be spend in the shop to unlock other methods of catching creatures and to encourage a wider variety of animals to enter your garden.

Keep catching creatures, create more contenders, and try to win every pageant to become the world's best beauty queen creator!

name: Unsolved
summary: Welcome to UNSOLVED - the ultimate FREE hidden object adventure experience viewed through detective eyes in the extraordinary world of mystery games, puzzling investigations, and tons of hidden clues waiting to be found.

name: Under the Streetlights of the Reiche
summary: "Under the Streetlights of the Reiche" is an omnibus-style adventure game. Experience one man's last day in the town. A good man who is well-liked by those around him loses his job and is forced to leave the town he has lived in for a long time.

name: Undead Awakens
summary: Fight against endless hordes of zombies in this action-packed, round-based survival game inspired by classic zombie shooters! Explore diverse maps, upgrade weapons, deploy automatic turrets, and call in airstrikes. Customize your arsenal with attachments and skins. Play online or in split-screen.

name: Unknown Host
summary: It's a short indie horror game where we step into the shoes of Alex, a student who, in search of more comfort, rents an apartment in the city that, at first glance, seems pretty decent - but upon arrival, he realizes something is not right.

name: Unchained: Tale of Enra
summary: A tactical RPG where trust is your greatest weapon. Build bonds with allies to unlock abilities, negotiate with enemies to recruit them, and shape your journey through choices that blend strategy, diplomacy, and emotional storytelling.

name: Unsent
summary:
Unsent is a wacky 3D platformer set in a labyrinthine 1970’s inspired post office.

Freshly out of work, Valentine has turned to his latest employment opportunity: a postman at the Unsentiment Department. Jump, dash, and fight your way through your postal route as you deliver letters that were never meant to be Unsent.

Throughout your journey as a postman, it's your job to deliver letters that have slipped from the human realm into the Unsentiment Department. Valentine's mail route will bring him from dilapidated mansions to bleak suburban neighborhoods in his quest to provide closure to those who never received their letters.

name: Underworld
summary:
Underworld is a classic old-school action role-playing game (ARPG) set in a dark, demonic world full of danger and secrets. Enter a cursed realm where the boundary between life and death has long since been broken, and ancient evils lurk around every corner.

As a lone female ninja, you face relentless hordes of demonic skeletons and other nightmarish creatures that haunt the underworld.

Forge your path by collecting powerful runes, upgrading your inventory, improving your gear, and unlocking devastating abilities. As you grow stronger, you’ll discover new combat techniques.

With fast-paced battles and a dark fantasy atmosphere, Underworld delivers an intense ARPG experience for fans of the genre.

name: Under The Surface
summary: Under The Surface is a fast-paced first-person maze game where players must navigate a dark, mysterious facility while evading a relentless presence. As you collect vital objectives scattered throughout the level, the environment reacts—becoming increasingly dangerous and unpredictable.

name: Undisputed: The Iron and Steel Pack
summary: Undisputed's The Iron and Steel Pack brings legendary brothers Wladimir “Dr. Steelhammer” and Vitali “Dr. Ironfist” Klitschko, along with five additional fighters including Jai Opetaia, Román “Chocolatito” González, Juan Francisco Estrada, Shannon Briggs, and Eric “Butterbean” Esch. Plus, six brand new sets of ring attire for the current roster.

name: Underwater Submarine Rush
summary: Underwater Submarine Rush is a thrilling endless game where you pilot a submarine through dangerous underwater terrain. Avoid obstacles, destroy them with standard shots or homing missiles, and activate a shield for protection when needed. Collect power-ups like extra ammo and health to extend your journey. The goal is to survive as long as possible and achieve the highest score!

name: Unknown: Raven Field
summary: Unknown - Raven Field is a mystery adventure game featuring a deep story and intense atmosphere. In the suspicious village of Raven Field, chase the whereabouts of Sofia’s missing younger brother, Noah, and get one step closer to proving Vincent Marlow’s innocence.

name: Untitled Hand Game
summary: Play as a frisky hand helping others find what they have lost. Use your mouse and click.

name: Untitled Hand Game: Titled Edition
summary: Embark on a short journey no hand on a stick has been on until now and never again. Rummage through things, avoid being slapped, and hand stuff out to other hands before they lose their patience.

name: Unto the Aurora
summary: Scotland, 1597. Escaping a death sentence for witchcraft, you set sail on a lonely and uncharted stretch of ocean - navigating and surviving the treacherous, strange and fantastical passage towards a new life.

name: Universal Car Ball
summary: Car Soccer eSports meets true team management and game customization! Play the way you enjoy it most and run private leagues/teams/events players can queue directly in game with your organization. Our goal is to build communities that are able to self manage and bring fun back to Car Ball <3

name: UnderMire
summary: UnderMire is a 1-4 player first person co-op roguelite adventure where you descend into a magical, ever-changing bunker to confront the dark forces that lie within. Battle fear-fueled monsters, SMUSH everyday junk into magical weapons, master evolving tools, complete tasks from a cantankerous spirit cat, and survive the chaos alone or with your friends using proximity voice chat.

name: Untitled PlatCard Game
summary: A game about a boy trapped in an endless dungeon trying to escape. Strategize with cards and create your own unique deck of cards to defeat different unique enemies and bosses.

name: Uniqlo × Boxboy!
summary:
UNIQLO × BOXBOY! is web browser based video game made in collaboration with Uniqlo, a Japanese clothing company, and Game Developers HAL Laboratory.
The game stars QBBY of the BOXBOY! series who can make boxes from his body which will occasionally feature the UNIQLO logo on them.
The game features 3 Level Packs which change based on which day of the week it is with said Level Packs being split between Easy, Normal, and Difficult.
Level Packs have you playing 3 levels in a row with there being a total of 63 different levels split across all Seven days.

name: Unboxathon
summary: Unboxathon is a cute content-packed incremental game about opening mystery boxes. Find rare items, upgrade your skills, and unlock new boxes & features! Collect shiny items, pop bubble wrap, and materialize artifacts out of thin air. Can you find your lost childhood plush?

name: Under Kingdom: Scam Centre Simulator
summary: Run your own scam centre and pay off your debt. Expand your business by recruiting workers through shady means. Bribe the police, trade with others, and use every strategy to survive in this city. Will you rise to power or fall under the pressure? The choice is yours.

name: Unfortunate Leaders
summary: Conquer the world! In this turn-based strategy game, play as one of the many unfortunate leaders with unique abilities. Build your resources and queue your moves effectively. Play with friends or test yourself online, and discover what kind of leader you will become!

name: Undefined Game Pack
summary: A series of classic browser flash games from Undefined. Tower Defense, RPG Series, & More!

name: Unsound Love
summary: An open-world horror game where you must figure out EVERYTHING yourself. You are born into a new world through the backseat of a destroyed car. Escape.

name: Unspoken Echoes
summary: A gothic horror role-playing game with three playable protagonists thrust into a murder mystery. Explore an old manor. Interrogate suspects. Try not to go insane.

name: Unreal Zombies
summary: From Phoenix Limit Studios (the creators of The Multiverse Trilogy, Alternate Universe and more) comes Unreal Zombies, a fast-paced FPS zombies horror game that brings you into a post-apocalyptic world.

name: Uno: Arcade Edition
summary: Uno ported to Apple Arcade.

name: Uni-Code
summary: A 2D platformer where you play as a magical unicorn battling through a world of alpha characters, symbols, and emojis! See if you can survive through all 26 levels of absolute unicorn madness!

name: Underfishing
summary: You just arrived in hell. Nothing left to to do but contemplate the life you lived, and fish. Fish out ancient treasures, upgrade your fishing abilities, and face your biggest regrets in this narrative fishing game! Will you manage to fish out Lucifer's crown and earn another chance at life?

name: Untamed Ehizia
summary: Untamed Ehizia is a sandbox MMORPG with multiple experimental game mechanics built around cooperation and social interactions. Come with friends or find new ones, and tame the world of Ehizia together.

name: Unfound Footage
summary: Unfound Footage is a short, atmospheric psychological horror game where you must survive inside a mysterious mansion after a strange disappearance.

name: Underpacked!
summary: Welcome to the galaxy´s biggest delivery company! Dive into a space odyssey as a delivery crew, alone or with your comrades. Dodge threats, survive the harsh realities of labor exploitation and deliver packages. Prove you’re the best employees in the universe!

name: Unseen Diplomacy 2
summary: You're a Secret Agent during a dangerous time, Evil-doers are plotting to destroy the world. Complete missions, manage your agents & use Intel to narrow down the plot & save the Earth. Play a real-life VR obstacle course using every inch of your room - you will run, roll, sneak & hack to victory!

name: Underside: The Lift
summary: A single-player survival roguelike horror game with randomly generated locations and permanent death. A mysterious labyrinth of post-Soviet apartments draws you into an atmosphere of solitude and plunges you into the darkness of the unknown.

name: Unwanted Dungeon
summary: A tactical survivorslike with classic RPG essence: unique builds, dual combat styles per class, rare loot, and semi-procedural level generation. Fast-paced action meets progression freedom and permadeath in a dark fantasy roguelike. Welcome to Unwanted Dungeon.

name: Undead Fortress
summary: Undead fortress is a simple and pure first-person shooter game that tests players' shooting reflexes and upgrade combinations.Players take on the role of a survivor in a post-apocalyptic world, constantly fighting against the pursuit of bio-armies and zombie waves.

name: Undead Presidents
summary: Undead Presidents is a chaotic, round-based zombie survival shooter with a satirical twist. Play as infamous world leaders in solo or 8-player co-op, battling undead hordes while uncovering dark conspiracies. Arm yourself with insane weaponry and rewrite history—one zombie at a time.

name: Unboxing: 1-Bit Paradox
summary: UNBOXING is a puzzle-platformer where death is your key. Die, revive, and solve tricky puzzles using your companion box to return back to life. Will you find the cause of this endless cycle? Will you break free?

name: Uncanny Tales: 1992
summary: Autumn, 1992. Anton, a 14-year-old boy, moves with his parents to a small town and is left alone in his grandmother's apartment. Meanwhile, children are disappearing across the town — the police are powerless, and no one knows who's behind it…

name: Under the Ruin
summary: Lead a squad deep into the ruins of the city. Scavenge for resources atop the remnants of the old civilization, and use the ruins to fend off the Swarm. In this unique salvage-and-defend strategy game, you will gradually uncover the source of the Calamity and rebuild human civilization.

name: Under the Disco Lights
summary: A story-driven management sim set in a 1980s disco bar. Mix drinks, handle guests, and uncover secrets behind the neon lights.

name: Underworld Tycoon
summary: Build your gang, recruit members, plan precise crimes, and seize territory through drug dealing, theft, and other illegal activities that impact the city's operations. Face off against rival gangs and outsmart the police to establish a new order in the city.

name: Unusual End
summary: Unusual End is a mod enhancing the End, by providing more diversity and content to the dimension, while trying to fit mostly Vanilla or mostly Modded End experiences.

name: Ungaland!
summary: "Dive into a prehistoric world of adventure where the power of primal seeds changes everything. Unlock abilities, attach them to your weapons, and face challenges in a vibrant land full of action, and surprises."

name: Under Rooms
summary: Under Rooms is a game of survival and exploration where reality is distorted and danger lurks around every corner. As Nick, a young man trapped in an infinite labyrinth, you must loot resources, forge alliances and confront hidden horrors. Will you escape or be lost forever?

name: Unhinged Pet Store Simulator
summary: Run your own crazy pet store! Buy wares, stock shelves, raise crabs, defend the store from the local thieving animals, hire workers and try to keep your store tidy while taking payment from impatient customers.

name: Unforgettable
summary: A game about drinking and talking. After dying in a car accident, you are reborn in a bar and are greeted by the bartender. Talk to the bartender and try to understand more about your situation while enjoying a few drinks.

name: Unlockers
summary: Noah wakes up to find himself in an unknown hotel-like bedroom. Team up with Sally, a girl with supernatural powers, to solve the mystery of the room and escape from this strange facility!

name: Unreturning
summary: An adventure where the journey matters more than the destination. Everyone who ventures into the depths always returns... but what if this time was different? Descend into the abyss, uncover its secrets, and make your journey unforgettable.

name: Unknowz
summary: Unknowz is a cooperative platformer where two pirates, one alive, the other undead, must combine their unique abilities to solve puzzles, avoid traps, and escape from a skeleton-infested island. Work together... or sink!

name: Unmurk
summary: You only see the outer edges of the puzzle. Put the puzzles back into place to reveal a hidden voxel object.

name: Unmasked Truths: Shattered Dreams
summary: 11 world-renowned experts are trapped together and must cooperate to survive... until conflicts arise, and they discover the greatest threat to their lives isn't the system they're resisting: it's each other! Discover the truth of who's living a lie in this fully voiced murder mystery adventure.

name: Under The Crisis: Dárlia Island Remaster
summary: In the control of Nilgo, a ranger responsible for guarding the region, you will need to escape the chaos that has taken hold of the island while surviving by battling creatures that are beyond the rational comprehension of science.

name: Uncharted Waters
summary: Uncharted Waters is a 16th century trade and combat simulation RPG for the Nintendo NES allowing players to take on the role of a seafaring trader.

name: Uncharted Waters IV with Power Up Kit: HD Version - 30th Anniversary Edition
Uncanny Valley: Le Petit Morte
summary: Step into the shadows of NYC in an open world vampire JRPG where each choice matters. Play as a fledgling vampire navigating a sprawling city—where alliances oft turn to betrayals as 12 bloodlines vie for power! Dive into darkness, battle your hunger, forge your legend in the city that never sleeps!

name: University Speedrun Simulator
summary: Under the blessing of your talents, speedrun university in as few turns as possible! Multiple endings await your discovery!

name: Un-Usual Hotline
summary: A retro-inspired horror puzzle game where you take calls on a un-usual hotline, identify supernatural threats, and use a cryptic manual to protect callers from paranormal danger.

name: Unsung Heroes 1898
summary: Unsung Heroes 1898 drops you into the heart of the Spanish-American War; a conflict fueled by imperialism, propaganda, and the sacrifices of those caught in its wake. From the jungles of Cuba to the hills of Puerto Rico, engage in major land battles that shaped a turning point in American history.

name: Unblock Ball
summary:
Find the path, get the stars.Go and unlock the ball.

Unblock Ball is a simple puzzle game that makes people feel like they are thinking. By moving the square, look for the path and direct the ball to roll to the target square. But the metal block cannot move. When you move the box and connect the path, the ball will scroll by itself. Some squares have stars to collect, choose squares with stars as a path, and try to collect more stars!

name: Unholy Souls
summary:
You are Josephine Garland, a Knight of the Inquisition. It is your duty to cleanse the land of the blasphemous arcane wielding heretics in the name of the Silent God.

Your work has you hunt down those who would defy the Silent God's will... and mete out bloody justice with a swift stroke of your sword.

Now, the tables have turned. All that you knew is gone in a bizarre twist. You turn from hunter to prey and flee as a curse put upon you sees fabric turn to flesh and bay lustily for your blood.

Is this a test from the Silent God? A curse formed from your own bloodstained hands? Will you ever escape this theatre of nightmares?

name: Untold Stories 1: Goliath
summary: The first installment of the Untold Stories series by renderXR. From forests to deserts. Go diving in the deepest oceans or go spelunking in the darkest caves. This map is an environment based map. It is extremely vast so that explains its name. It starts off relatively easy, but it gets harder and harder over time. But be wary, the map has a fair amount of traps.

name: Untold Stories 2: Bigleaf Forest
summary:
The second map in the Untold Stories series made by renderXR. Stranded on an island full of vast trees you must survive. Explore and
discover in this overgrown wilderness. This is an open-world map that is more of a survival map than an adventure map. Also, because this
map has many leaves, fire doesn't spread, just to save your computer some hassle.

name: Underwheels
summary:
He took your wife.

You took his legs.

name: University of Problems
summary: Student life is perhaps the most vivid, colorful, and memorable period of life for many of us. You start your adult life, feel unlimited possibilities, make a lot of new acquaintances. "University of Problems" is just about it.

name: Universal Wardrobe
summary: This mod adds dozens of unique outfits and variants of both new and vanilla outfits, mostly to give a lot of uniqueness to the npcs of the game. You’ll be able to get these new clothing pieces in chests all around the universe, some of them well kept in the brand-new costume boxes. You will also find a new crafting table: the Customization Desk , where you can customize, combine and create clothing items along with new dyes.

name: Unshuffle
summary: Every step triggers a reaction: tiles shift, objects change, paths open or disappear. Think several moves ahead, and outwit the puzzle. Inspired by "Impass", an old flash game, this clever little logic game was crafted for the Playdate, with more original levels and new mechanics.

name: Under Destruction
summary: In a dystopian future dominated by artificial intelligence, humanity teeters on the brink of extinction. Machines, led by the supreme AI “Axis”, fight for control of Erythonite, a revolutionary mineral fueling the war. You are Spyro, an elite combat drone tasked with a critical mission: secure Erythonite deposits, eliminate human defenses, and ensure machine dominance.

name: Unsung Escape
summary: Unsung Escape is a vertical action-platformer where you outrun an ever-rising Void. Use Energy Orbs to gain movement abilities like double-jumps and dashes. No enemies—just pure platforming, exploration, and survival.

name: Under the Lighthouse
summary: In the middle of a stormy night, Liv reunites with an old friend. A short linear visual novel.

name: Underdark
summary: You woke up after the accident, and now you're looking for help and a way out of this dark land. Surrounded by darkness, traps, and... those creatures... you come across him...

name: Unnatural Force
summary: Vengeful spirits return, and Hoshino Town is in terror! Play as Mizuki, the lone survivor, and uncover the truth behind the disappearances. Shooting + customizable outfits + action combat + supernatural investigation. Fight spirits disguised as students—this time, she needs your help!

name: Unpuzzle Quest
summary: Unpuzzle Quest is a relaxing and engaging puzzle game where your goal is to disassemble intricate tile arrangements piece by piece. With simple touch mechanics and an intuitive interface, the game offers a calming yet stimulating experience for players of all skill levels.

name: Under the Red Sky
summary: Under The Red Sky is a 3D parkour game where speed is king! Your goal is to get to the end of each level as quick as possible by taking one of the many different routes possible, or by finding your own. Watch out though, this isn't all fun and games. You may accidentally fall into the past and uncover what happened and how to get back above. You may find that you're now Under the Red Sky.

name: Underworld: Allied Expedition
summary: Valhalla's sealed abyss unleashed dark hordes during a magical cataclysm. United surface races repelled the invasion but now venture into the unfathomable pit to confront ancient evils and uncover truths buried beneath their war-torn world.

name: Unboxing Mr. Coo
summary: Mr Coo gets into a new conundrum, this time through the not-so-simple act of opening a gift box. A puzzle and narrative game without words, where you click your way through a mesmerizing toy.

name: Universal Hologram
summary:
universal hologram is a science fiction text-based game about consciousness, dreaming, suffering, and sand.

it takes about an hour to play, and has numerous branching pathways and several distinct endings.

name: Unicorns: The Troll Adventure
summary: A fairytale adventure for all those who love fantasy, suspense and a pinch of magic!

name: Undertale Promise
summary:
Undertale Promise is a fan-made prequel to Undertale Yellow, a fan-made prequel to Toby Fox's UNDERTALE.

Follow Harmony through Snowdin to find her lost friend while evading the royal guard.

Meet familiar faces and make new friends in this friendly RPG where somebody has to die.

Can you avert the tragedy waiting to happen?

name: Uncle Sam's Supermarket Simulator
summary: Manage your own supermarket, from stocking shelves to handling customers. Build, upgrade, and expand your store while making strategic decisions to keep customers happy and your business booming. Can you become the ultimate supermarket tycoon?

name: Unexpected Journey
summary: Unexpected Journey follows reporter Lina Woodberry on an assignment aboard a cruise ship to interview celebrities. After a sudden turn of events, she finds herself in remote, perilous locations and must make her way back to civilization. Gameplay centers on finding listed objects in richly detailed scenes, opening containers to reveal items, and solving spot‑the‑difference and other mini‑games. Select items are stored in an inventory film strip for drag‑and‑drop interactions, while a hint meter recharges over time or via collectible batteries

name: Undockable
summary: Survive as Hjorti — a living heart in a chaotic game world! Build modular weapons, face endless enemies, outsmart unique bosses, and enjoy dark humor. Craft your strategy, mix deadly combos, and survive the madness!

name: Unfoldink
summary: Unfoldink is a 2D logical puzzle adventure game where you craft unique combinations of cards, to come up with animated stories that explain the tribe's depararature. Use the cards they left behind to your advantage and explore the tribe's ways of living.

name: Under Night In-Birth II Sys:Celes - Character Unlock: Izumi
Unguided
summary: Escape a digital prison, upload yourself back into the real world, and get revenge on the ones who framed you in this fast-paced challenging roguelike slasher

name: University Is Hell
summary: A twisted narrative adventure with branching quests and deadly choices. Relive the same cursed day in a darkly comedic university full of violent classes, shady professors, and disturbing secrets.

name: Unofficial Pokemon Trading Card Game
summary: Unofficial Extension for collecting and trading Pokemon cards. Users collect digital currency to open digital packs with. Complete missions, earn rare cards, level up and share your collection with each other on Twitch! This is a community focused and built game, this is not officially licensed or endorsed by the official Pokemon Company.

name: Unspoken
summary: Slightly based on a true story, where someone goes through depression and a hard time. On the verge of suicide. It is a 2d puzzle platformer with some psychological horror elements. You will be controlling a whisp, we did this to leaving the interpretation of the Character to the players.

name: Untapped
summary: "Untapped": A co-op cooking roguelite where every run is a fresh new challenge. Team up with friends to serve impatient customers, using cards to unlock new recipes and upgrades! Adapt and improve your kitchen on the fly as the challenge ramps up.

name: Untime
summary:
After an unfortunate incident, Circe moves from the big city to the small town of Dugo to start fresh. But maybe there are some things she can't change.

Untime is a short narrative-driven experience that takes 15 minutes to complete in one sitting.

name: Uncommon App
summary: Uncommon App is a narrative-driven simulation game where you play as an admissions officer balancing academic merit, magical ability, and finances. Review diverse student profiles, conduct interactive interviews, and make impactful decisions that shape the school's future.

name: Unpredictable Star
summary: Unpredictable Star is a strategy adventure game. Players need to protect their base in the unpredictable star domain, manage the cafe inside the base, recruit new partners, explore and battle.

name: Undead Hunter Part I
summary: Undead Hunter is a realistic first-person shooter with a dark and scary atmosphere, created on the Unreal Engine 5. Take up arms and go destroy the undead. From the dead to werewolves and demons. Go to forests and abandoned cities and clear the places from the undead. Can you defeat them all?

name: Unextinction
summary: Stranded at sea and trapped on a dinosaur-infested island, uncover hidden secrets in a lost sci-fi bio lab while fighting to survive, escape, and outlast natures deadliest era.

name: Unswappers
summary: Unswappers is an exciting game where the player becomes an agent of a timeless organization tasked with fixing changes in reality, also referred to as "Anomalies" or "Swaps", caused by Reality Rifts.

name: Unfair Flips
summary: A non-idle clicker game about flipping a coin that hates you. Starting with just a 20% chance of getting heads, can you get ten heads in a row?

name: Underground: Chapter 1
summary: Underground is a first-person horror-puzzle game where you explore a mysterious subway system, solve deadly puzzles, and escape the creatures lurking in the dark. Will the train take you home—or deeper into the nightmare?

name: Under The Floor
summary: Psychological horror simulator where every game is unpredictable. Events, sounds, and rules change each time. Face hostile entities in a haunted house. You can’t foresee anything. You can only survive… or break.

name: Underground Security Inc
summary: Defend your dungeon against "heroes" in this rogue-lite base defense game. Assign minions, build traps, and mine ores. All in the name of becoming the most profitable dungeon!

name: Unusual and Not Safe Experiments
summary: Unusual and NOT Safe Experiments is an action-puzzle game where you control a robot trying to escape from an abandoned complex, overcoming traps and solving puzzles.

name: Unity to Survive
summary: A 3rd-person co-op survival shooter for up to 4 players. Fight off endless waves of monsters, upgrade your gear, and defeat giant bosses through teamwork and fast-paced action.

name: Underwater Cycling
summary: **Underwater Cycling** takes you on an exhilarating underwater adventure where you as main character race on high-tech bicycles that glide through the ocean's depths.

name: UNI 2
summary: The ultimate collection of 2-player mini games is here!

name: Unholy Trinity
summary: A local multiplayer co-op game where a group of heroes explores a dungeon to collect treasures to power up in order to defeat the Fire Demon at the cost of potentially opening a portal to hell.

name: Union Survivors
summary: "UNION SURVIVORS" is a roguelite mining survival game that supports online cooperative play for up to 4 players. Players dig through slime-filled terrain to carve their paths and defeat hordes of enemies.

name: Underground Nomads
summary: You're the commander of a drilling train, leading a clan of dwarves through the underground depths toward the planetary core. Manage the crew, complete expeditions, gather resources, upgrade equipment, and make tough choices to reach the abandoned city and return your people to their home.

name: Untitled Sonic Fangame
summary: Untitled Sonic Fangame is a game inspired by Eggman Hates Furries as well as Sonic Boom (the rom hack) and Super Meat Boy

name: Undersea: Waves and Adventures
summary: You are the captain of a submarine of a small Ukrainian island state, with a big baggage of dreams and a lot of problems. Sink enemy ships, explore mysterious abandoned bases, steal secret documents. Drink tea and don't forget to have fun. Your team is already waiting for you. To the Battle!

name: Undertale 10th Anniversary
summary: Two fights that were featured in the UNDERTALE 10th Anniversary event, released after the event.

name: Undress!
summary: Memory game, find a pair of underwear to undress the girl!

name: Undead Exterminator
summary: "The Undead Exterminator" is an exciting 3D zombie shooter where players pick up a rifle and battle hordes of the undead. You will have to shoot zombies and survive in an apocalyptic world.

name: Unshine Arcade
summary: An arcade full of secrets, a sentient virtual pet in the prize cabinet, a stealth shooter roguelite arcade machine and one way to escape: win tickets.

name: Unique Identy
summary: Unique Identy is a roguelite action platformer inspired by the metroidvania style. You earn points by continuously killing incoming enemies and try to survive. There are no save points; kill, die, learn, and repeat. The points you earn are permanent, but the enemies become increasingly tougher.

name: Unique Lady
summary: Unique Lady is an FMV (full-motion video) love game. The story centers around the prime minister's daughter named Lin Luojing. She is involved in a huge conspiracy which is related to the 4 heroes, during the time she lives in Shengjing.

name: Undeclaration of Human Rights
summary:
You have been conscripted by an absurd dictator on a strange mission: to undeclare the Universal Declaration of Human Rights. Don’t worry; it's all justified - he says.

With quirky, thought-provoking levels, each inspired by a different article from the Declaration, you’ll navigate unique mini-puzzles, unravel questionable logic, and endure the "guidance" of an eccentric dictator who seems to have missed the memo on basic human decency.

name: Until the End
summary: Love remembers you. Even if you’ve forgotten.

name: Unlog
summary: Unlog is a fast-paced 2D platformer about a sleepy goblin trying to escape a mysterious dream factory. Dash, wall jump and avoid the traps to get as fast as you can ! Believe us, you'll need it.

name: Undertaker
summary: Hunt eldritch horrors in the cursed lands of Transylvania. Stalk your prey with both stealth and bullets, craft your ideal loadout, and conduct unnatural rituals in this stealth-action shooter.

name: Undawning: The New Moon
summary: Everyone, at least once, dreams of becoming a hero. But what does it truly mean to be one? Help Cassius confront his doubts and ideals in his journey to become the kind of hero he once admired in this grid-based Pixel RPG.

name: Unknown Hero
summary: Brace yourself for an intense bullet hell experience! Fight your way through challenging levels, defeat bosses, upgrade your weapon and get the highest score!

name: United City
summary: A simple casual game that can be completed with just a click of a mouse, revisiting the past from a sci-fi perspective and experiencing a different life scene in domestic towns in the 1990s, with a cinematic reading experience.

name: University Life Visual Novel
summary: Welcome to University Life! Set in the vibrant town of Falls Ville, you're about to embark on an incredible journey filled with new experiences and opportunities.

name: Unit Zero: Operation Black Veil
summary: Unit Zero is a first-person multiplayer shooter with realistic bodycam-style graphics made in Unreal Engine 5. Includes competitive and cooperative zombie modes. Investigate what went wrong in the secret operation that unleashed the nightmare.

name: United Heist: Facility Zero
summary: Work together in separate locations, each filled with unique puzzles that only your partner can help solve. Every move depends on sharp communication through in-game voice chat. Can you crack the code and escape before time runs out?

name: Unseen
summary: Unseen is an indie horror game in which John, a forensic photographer, is forced to spend the night away from home after an unexpected and exhausting shift. What seemed like a temporary rest soon begins to turn unsettling.

name: Unattached: City of Shadows
summary: Freshly-graduated detective James Arnold is sent on a mission to investigate the death of the mayor of New Eastbrook, a little-known city where corruption is tradition. Investigate crime scenes, interrogate suspects, and fight criminals in a city where every choice pulls you deeper into the shadows.

name: Under a Desert Sun: Seekers of the Cursed Vessel
summary: Under a Desert Sun: Seekers of the Cursed Vessel, is a single-player and co-op action RPG set in WWII-era Egypt. Battle soldiers and undead hordes, explore ancient tombs, and uncover a dark curse. Play solo or with friends in local co-op, with new heroes and content coming in Early Access.

name: Unshaken
summary: Try on the role of a former detective who has become the best contract killer. Complete the tasks by destroying everyone who gets in your way in a challenging adventure! Genres: 2D platformer, action, arcade, adventure. Visual style: Cyberpunk, pixel art.

name: Unsealed Pact
summary: A dark fantasy roguelike deckbuilder. Build your deck, wield forbidden powers, and face relentless enemies — where every choice seals your fate.

name: Untitled Car Game
summary: Explode your friends in this rogue-lite deckbuilding racer! Acquire fun upgrades and create powerful synergies to dominate the arena!

name: Unseen Land: Into the Mist
summary: For centuries, Veridia thrived. Now, an otherworldly invader tears rifts, unleashing maddened beasts. In the chaos, you awaken—once a humble farmer and hunter. Take up the sword, wield your power, and save Veridia.

name: Uncle Lee’s Cookbook: Five Recipes for Disaster
summary: Uncle Lee has done it again. It’s up to you to pick up the pieces. Join rebellious teen Ines as she deals with the fallout of her uncle Lee’s experiments/inventions/cooking, in a modern point & click adventure in five self-contained episodes.

name: Universe Slime
summary: UNIVERSE SLIME is a destruction action game where everything is destructible. Control the UNIVERSE SLIME, destroy towns and cities, swallow everything, and become a new star to replace the sun and save the solar system.

name: Undead Sentence
summary: Trapped in a decaying prison overrun by the undead, you must fight, scavenge, and survive. Undead Sentence is a retro-style survival horror FPS with brutal combat, atmospheric levels, and zero forgiveness.

name: Unquiet Grey
summary:
Unquiet Grey is a visual novel about love and grief.

You wake up by the side of the road, alone and freezing. A stranger’s jacket covers you.

You don’t recognise it. You don’t recognise the man it belongs to either, staring out from the ID card you find in the pocket.

So why is there a picture of him and you on his phone screen?

name: Untold Chronicles: The Harvest
summary: In this field, what is harvested doesn’t sprout from the earth. Something hides among the cornfields, watching all the time. Explore and dare to see what the earth itself tries to conceal… because this time, you are part of the harvest.

name: Undead Tread
summary: Mow down hordes of zombies in a high-speed vehicular roguelike! Tear through the undead with front-mounted guns, upgrade your car, and battle through procedurally generated highways, cities, and rural roads. Will you reach the cure, or become just another wreck in the apocalypse?

name: Unhinged
summary: Hunger won’t kill you, but losing your mind will. Explore, craft, and build machines to survive an open-world corporate death game in this brutal sanity-first survival craft simulator.

name: Unconventional Fantasy
summary: This game combines the gameplay of text adventure and card battles. You will play as an office worker who travels to another world, selecting cards to build your own deck. Random choice events provide you with various effects. Will you save everything, destroy everything, or do nothing at all?

name: Uncharted Sectors
summary: A grand strategy game built on a deep economic simulation and orchestrated by an intelligent AI storyteller. Ensure the survival of your domain at the edge of the galaxy: colonize worlds, manage populations, navigate politics, design custom goods, and master dynamic markets.

name: Underway Remastered
summary: This remastering of moral-testing adventure/puzzle RPG "Underway" will give you chills in places you didn't know you could get them! With a deep and intriguing story to boot, you'll have a great time getting lost in the world and story!

name: Ungodly
summary: UnGodly is a dark fantasy RPG where visceral real-time combat meets collectible hero strategy. Build your roster, chain elemental powers through seamless team swapping, and forge bonds that unlock devastating synergies in a world on the edge of ruin.

name: Under Heaven or Hell
summary:
You wake up in Hell with no memory of how you got there, and no clear way out.

To return home, you will have to survive the brutal politics of this realm and forge alliances with two dangerous devils and an enigmatic angel, each with their own secrets, and temptations that may pull you closer.

Will you escape with your soul intact, or will your path become forever tied to those who linger within the flames?

Your choices will shape your fate, and perhaps, the fate of Hell itself.

name: Untitled Shantae Game
summary: The seventh entry to the Shantae series.

name: Undead Night Crew
summary: The zombie horde is here and no one was prepared. You are alone, but you can find other unassuming survivors to join your crew. In this roguelite survivor, utilize whatever weapons, tools, and skills are at your crew's disposal to survive the horde and live through another night!

name: Unchained
summary: UNCHAINED is a psychological horror game where you explore an abandoned virtual desktop hiding a terrible secret. The deeper you look into this 2D and 3D experience, the more secrets you'll uncover about the projects that were left behind by the previous owner.

name: UnGrind
summary: UnGrind is a workplace strategy game about clocking out on time. Outsmart your randomly patrolling boss while handling chaotic tasks and annoying colleagues. Plan your route, manage your time, and avoid overtime in this satirical take on office life. Can you escape the daily grind?

name: Underpond
summary: Delve into the depths of the amphibian afterlife, the eponymous UNDERPOND in this procedurally generated, hand drawn, frog hopping roguelite.

name: Under the Tree 2: Hedgerows
summary: The sequel to Under The Tree! A first-person grid-based dungeon crawler inspired by the original Wizardry first released on the Apple ][, simplified to suit the screen and controls of the Playdate. Featuring an all-new 3D graphics engine, with dungeon and outdoor areas, quests, puzzles and more!

name: Unlimited Farm Tycoon: Cozy Idle Farm Game
summary: Build your dream farm in 8 different worlds. You can plant a tree farm, create a vegetable garden, or even raise animals. Build your fences wherever you want in the open world, create the farm you desire.

name: Under His Eyes
summary: Under His Eyes is a gritty, story-driven strategy game where you play a crime boss. Make game-changing decisions, manage your crew and income, send operatives on missions, seize districts, and eliminate rivals. Will you rise through subtlety, rule with fear, or fall to a small-time gang?

name: UnderPoint
summary: A fangame of Undertale made entirely in Powerpoint. Enjoy your favorite friendly RPG in a brand new way by discovering the secrets of what lays beyond time and space.

name: Unguided Order
summary: In a world where ancient barriers are crumbling, Darkness approaches Master Leo's home. Using a powerful artifact, Leo attempts to repel the threat. Your key tasks are strategy, creature selection, and tactical deployment, while your troops and the Master handle the battles and application of magic.

name: United We Forge
summary: Deep beneath the mountains lies a living forge, where rival creatures — Ogres, Goblins, and Amphibians — must set aside their grudges to craft powerful gear. In this competitive card strategy game, every card you play shapes the delicate balance between power and collaboration.

name: Underdrown
summary:
1928, Estonia, Arumere, near Pärnu.

A small, northern village, on the shore of the Baltic Sea. A small rural school, overlooking the beach. The main character, instead of studying, prefers to look at the northern sea.

But one day, he saw something strange... Something that should not be there...

name: Unusual Tales: Deep Below
summary:
Unusual Tales is an episodic psychological horror game that follows a main character through what seems like a never ending nightmare. Will they make it to the end in one piece?

The city you once knew and grew up in isn't safe at all anymore after recent events. You, a regular working Joe, decide to take things into your own hands after a spontaneous decision. Will you regret or accept your new destiny?

This game features many things that might peak your attention such as:
An hour long scary experience depending on pace
A horror experience filled with scares
Complete voice acting for each character
Lighthearted writing and amusing moments
A dark city full of secrets to explore
Environments to keep you on edge
And much more!

Maybe today was a day that you should've stayed in bed.
But who am I to decide on your decisions in the end...
You want to save her don't you?

name: Unknown Fluffy Object
summary: Play as Buddy the sheepdog in this 3rd-person puzzle game. Herd sheep across rivers, cliffs, and rolling hills of Scotland while fending off mischievous UFOs with your mighty super bark.

name: Undercity of Sin
summary: Experience a story of crime and gang warfare as you fight your way through eight procedurally generated dungeons full of machine soldiers and superpowered weaponry, and explore a skill tree with numerous ways to power up your character as you overcome this traditional turn-based RPG.

name: Unseen
summary: A story-driven visual novel set within the dark corridors of the mind. Uncover your past through choices, shape your fate with dice. Unseen blends psychological horror and eldritch atmosphere into a haunting narrative full of forgotten memories and buried fears.

name: Ungrounded
summary: Ungrounded is a first-person puzzle adventure game. Explore, observe, and engage with Ungrounded's mechanisms and machinery. The further you travel, the more uncertain the path home.

name: Unhinged
summary: Unhinged, a petty act of injustice spirals into obsession. Dynamic environments and psychological horror blur reality, testing your perception—and your sanity. You will find mazes, platforms to jump on, and interactions with your neighbor to find the one responsible.

name: Undead
summary: A brutal and humorous 2D belt-scroller with hundreds of frames of hand-crafted animation—built for both Steam and Commodore 64. Punch, kick, grab, throw, hurl, shoot, smash and decapitate your enemies in 100x120px glory.

name: Underground
summary: Underground is an independent FPS horror game that immerses you in a vast network of dark, labyrinthine caves. You play as a spelunker lost in this terrifying expanse. Your objective is simple yet nerve-wracking: find the only exit before the situation becomes fatal.

name: Underneath
summary: UNDERNEATH is a fast-paced, stylized Metroidvania situated in a poor, underground city. Collect trash & loot, explore an expansive urban wasteland, engage with fascinating characters, and make choices that will affect how Emma's story will end--for better or worse.

name: Undertaker
summary: The veil between life and death is shattered. Corpses walk, the earth trembles, and chaos reigns. As the Undertaker, your duty is clear return the dead to the dead by any means necessary. Inspired by classic FPS games like DOOM and Blood fast-paced action in a world gone mad.

name: Underworld
summary: Underworld is a co-op roguelike FPS with waves of monsters, boss fights, and procedurally generated levels. Upgrade your gear, buy weapons, stack buffs, and go deeper into the Underworld to discover its secrets. PC & VR Cross-play.

name: UnBound
summary: Collect orbs scattered around a peaceful island environment in a relaxing first-person adventure experience. Explore, level up, and become UnBound.

name: Unbound
summary: Help Mox break out from his unjust inprisonment. Navigate through a hazardous, futuristic city and outrun your pursuer to reach an off-world colony in this 2D precision-platformer!

name: Unknown Faces
summary: Unknown Faces is a 6-15 player multiplayer social deduction game inspired by the Mafia party game, reimagined with darker themes and deeper strategy. Lies, manipulation, and betrayal fuel every round as players deceive, outsmart, and expose one another in a fight for survival.

name: UN:Me
summary: UN:Me is an adventure game where you guide a girl harboring multiple souls within her body through an unsettling mental labyrinth, engaging in dialogue with each soul while making the harrowing choice of which to keep and which to erase in your escape attempt.

name: UnoDos
summary: Take control of Uno and Dos using just one controller to solve puzzles with minimalist graphics. The characters have unique abilities: one can jump, while the other can dash forward. The characters must use these abilities to solve the stages and progress through the levels.

name: Unholy Adventure: Mystery
summary: In the world of point and click adventure games, Unholy Adventure: Mystery will offer you a distinctive experience of story-rich adventure with a hint of surrealism.

name: Uncharted: Fight for Fortune - Among Thieves Expansion
summary: Among Thieves Expansion is a downloadable content for Uncharted: Fight for Fortune card game which adds new cards featuring content from Uncharted 2: Among Thieves game.

name: Uncharted: Fight for Fortune - Drake's Deception Expansion
summary: Drake's Deception Expansion is a downloadable content for Uncharted: Fight for Fortune card game which adds new cards featuring content from Uncharted 3: Drake's Deception game.

name: Understeel
summary:
The city will fall. Fear rises with the shadows.

The world ends today. Can you survive it? Something has fallen upon the city. It is immense. It is relentless. This is not an invasion. This is an ending. Your only goal is to survive. How long can you last?

name: Untold Capers
summary: Untold Capers follows the early days of Oswald and Mickey in a story inspired by 1930s cartoons. The game traces the events that shaped them, revealing moments never shown on screen. Play through their timeline as they take on odd jobs, escape trouble, and uncover how their paths first crossed.

name: Unsolved Case: Whispers of Elderwick - Collector’s Edition
summary: A killer hides behind familiar faces. Solve puzzles, uncover hidden clues, and expose the conspiracy tearing the village apart before fear consumes it whole.

name: Unicycle Sheep
summary: Can a sheep on a unicycle reach its goal? Start on a small island, learn to balance, and ride your way toward the tallest mountain on a physics-driven unicycle. Navigate chaotic islands, overcome tricky obstacles, and try not to fall

name: Uncle's Basement: The Winter House
summary: Finding yourself in an old winter house, you are faced with harsh conditions: icy cold, strong winds and lack of resources. This house will become your shelter, but to survive you will have to use all available means. Will you be able to survive this winter?

name: Unfair Dungeon
summary: A cruel and simple movement clicker game. Starting with a 1-in-4 chance to move as planned, can you collect the Coin of Rehtaeh and escape in 10 steps? Rage, upgrade, persevere, and discover multiple endings.

name: Unsealed: The Mare
summary:
Unsealed: The Mare is a first-person psychological horror game set in a nightmare rooted in memory and trauma.

Players explore dark, oppressive environments while uncovering fragmented messages and hidden memories that subtly alter the world around them.

The experience emphasizes tension, sound awareness, and atmosphere, encouraging players to move carefully, listen closely, and piece together meaning through environmental storytelling.

name: Underwater
summary: Set in the Mariana Trench inside a marine biology research laboratory, where everything goes wrong. Discover, scavenge, collect, and hide. Find out what happened and how to escape, if you can. Will you survive?

name: Unregret
summary: An angry office worker named Butch snaps and sets off on a brutal journey toward his dream of becoming a Hollywood actor. Fight through hordes of enemies in a fast-paced 2D beat ‘em up, using combo-based combat and any weapons you can find - from bare fists to automatic rifles.

name: Unstrange
summary: You are an 11-year-old child. Every month, your mother leaves you at your grandmother’s isolated house, far from the city and surrounded by silence. It has always felt like a routine—quiet, lonely, but safe.

name: Underchoice
summary: Underchoice is a survival simulator set in a sealed bunker. Become the overseer and shape the fate of those who come knocking at the door. Each decision you make, whether it is to let in a stranger, to use your resources on something, or to risk the safety of the bunker.

name: Uno x Anime
summary: This was part of a McDonald's Happy Meal promotion in limited regions.

name: Unbowed
summary: Choose your fate in this single-player pirate Soulslike where you explore cursed lands, battle eldritch horrors, and pillage any treasure you find. Death is only a temporary setback on the path to mastering brutal combat.
